title: Capitec Bank employees save more than 1 hour per week with Microsoft 365 Copilot and Azure Open AI
executive_summary: Capitec Bank, South Africa’s largest retail bank centered on customers, strives to keep things simple, affordable, and accessible. The bank's Head of Data Transformation wanted to make things even simpler for employees.
products: Power BI, Microsoft 365

title: Healthcare for All with Kry using Azure Open AI Service
executive_summary: In the fast-paced world of digital transformation, healthcare companies like Kry are leading the charge in adopting cutting-edge technologies that cut down administrative tasks and allow medical professionals to better focus on their patients’ well-being.
products: Azure Operator Call Protection

title: PageGroup invests in Microsoft Azure to build a platform for innovation using responsible AI
executive_summary: PageGroup finds talent for its clients so they can grow their businesses. Much of a consultant’s work is admin intensive, so opportunities for efficiency can make a big impact. They built a global enterprise data platform on Microsoft Azure, creating a platform for further innovation and the use of cloud-based technologies, such as generative AI. Innovations with Azure and OpenAI are already having real business impact.

title: Pangaea Data and Microsoft Azure optimize patient care with the help of AI
executive_summary: Millions of patients across 7,000 hard-to-diagnose conditions remain undiagnosed, for example, up to 90% of patients with Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) are currently undiagnosed. This results in poor outcomes, heightened costs and inefficiencies across healthcare and pharmaceuticals. Both industries have tried applying AI to resolve this, but due to privacy regulations, they are limited to collaborating on ad-hoc projects with de-identified datasets, which does not help find such missed patients and treat them at scale. With the help of Microsoft Azure, Pangaea Data built a scalable AI-powered product platform to discover such missed patients and connect to them. For instance, Pangaea Data worked with two global pharmaceuticals and the UK’s National Health Service (NHS) to find 6x more (200,000) undiagnosed and miscoded cachectic cancer patients for therapies and trials, which led to improved outcomes for patients, halving treatment costs for the NHS (saving £1 billion) and a six-fold increase in revenue for the pharmaceutical sponsors.
products: Azure Blob Storage, Azure Container Instances, Azure Operator Call Protection, Azure Virtual Machines, Azure Key Vault

title: Cognizant makes performance management more effective and meaningful with Microsoft Azure Machine Learning
executive_summary: Cognizant, one of the world’s leading professional services companies, works with businesses to make everyday life even better—for their employees, their customers, and the communities they serve. The company leverages IoT, AI, software engineering, and the cloud to digitize the products, services, and customer experiences of its clients; automate their business processes; and modernize their technology infrastructure. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant has a rapidly expanding footprint that extends from India and China to Europe, North America, South America, and the Middle East. It helps clients across industries envision, build, and run innovative digital enterprises.
customer: Cognizant Technology Solutions India Pvt Ltd
products: Azure, Azure AI and Machine Learning, Azure Machine Learning

title: AudioCodes leverages Azure to cut Teams Phone deployment time and facilitate native CCaaS offering for Teams
executive_summary: AudioCodes has been on a mission to transform enterprise telephony for 30 years, and its partnership with Microsoft has been central to its growth. After migrating most of its solutions to Microsoft Azure, AudioCodes achieved faster deployment for its solutions, lowered costs, and improved SLAs. Thanks to its solutions being transactable on Azure Marketplace AudioCodes can also reach more clients than ever before, for maximum impact.

title: Strabag SE builds a risk management solution to improve efficiency using Microsoft Intelligent Data Platform
executive_summary: As one of the oldest industries in the world, construction hasn’t always kept pace with the modernization that has swept across other industries, particularly when it comes to driving operational efficiencies with data. But one organization is determined to change that. Strabag SE, the global construction company, partnered with Microsoft to build a Data Science Hub to collect decentralized data and leverage it for insights. This enabled the organization to develop use cases to prove the value of data including its risk management project. The solution uses an algorithm to pinpoint at-risk construction projects, saving Strabag SE time and reducing financial losses. With data now at the helm, Strabag SE is cementing its future in a traditional industry on the path to digitalization.

title: KPMG augments current capabilities and improves service delivery model with Azure OpenAI Service
executive_summary: Brad Brown, Global Technology leader and CIO for Tax at KPMG, and Rafiq Jalal, Principal at KPMG, Cloud and Data Strategy, spoke with us about how KPMG is putting Azure OpenAI Service to work.

title: Aprimo launches first ChatGPT within Azure OpenAI DAM integration, giving marketers enhanced, scalable automation
executive_summary: Aprimo develops and sells marketing automation software and digital asset management (DAM) technology to support enterprise marketing and customer experience teams. With a solution that is 100 percent on Azure, Aprimo is dedicated to delivering helpful, cutting-edge SaaS (software as a service) solutions to help modern brands bring powerful, omnichannel customer experiences to life, at scale. Aprimo focused on creating an embedded generative AI assistant using Azure OpenAI Service and ChatGPT to develop the solution and address specific use cases, such as accelerating the creation and delivery of concise, engaging, and personalized content that is trained on a customer’s brand voice and tone. The company hopes that with an embedded generative AI assistant customers can create more concise, engaging, and personalized content.

title: CallMiner partners with Microsoft to convert conversations into action with Azure AI Services
executive_summary: Customer service contact centers can carry out thousands of interactions per day. The process of answering calls, responding to chats and emails, understanding customers’ needs and requests, and delivering the desired outcome can be challenging. What’s more, those interactions contain a wealth of valuable insights that have the power to drive meaningful business-performance improvements. From why customers are contacting your organization and how your agents are performing to potential issues such as with your products and services or compliance risks, intelligence from the contact center can help leaders make better decisions to improve efficiency, customer experiences, product innovation, and more. CallMiner’s AI-driven platform empowers organizations to ingest and analyze every conversation that happens in the contact center and beyond to uncover insights, take action, and drive transformational change.

title: Supply chain insights with just one click: ALTANA pools knowledge in graph database built on Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: Knowledge transfer is essential for the success of a company—not only when experienced employees are retiring and it’s necessary to preserve and pass on their many years of expertise. Chemical company ALTANA started early on to consolidate the knowledge of its purchasing department in a central location. To do this, the company is relying on a graph database, Microsoft Azure, and PRODYNA, a member of the Microsoft Partner Network. The EMPOWER platform solution not only minimizes time and effort, increases performance, and enables price predictions with a deviation of only 5 percent, it also brings more transparency to sustainability data in the supply chains.

title: Crediclub saves 96% per month in audit processes and analyzes 150 meetings per hour with Azure
executive_summary: Crediclub recognized the need to enhance the operational management of its over 150 branches to maintain the consistency and quality of its processes.

title: Sheló NABEL jumps into the future with Microsoft Dynamics 365 and increases its sales by 17%
executive_summary: Sheló NABEL's expansion highlighted challenges within its operating model. The company required real-time visibility and control to facilitate improved decision-making and effective management of independent entrepreneurs.

title: SONEM sensors create efficiencies in the beer brewing process using Microsoft Azure IoT Edge
executive_summary: Germany has a unique brewery landscape. Besides its traditional breweries, for some years now a growing number of craft beer breweries have been supplying the market with an even greater variety of beers. The ultrasonic sensors from SONEM Solutions GmbH help breweries of any size improve the efficiency of their brewing processes. These autonomous sensors use the industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) to continuously collect data during the production process, ensuring beer quality by comparing this data with a reference measurement—in real time and with zero contact. A joint case study looked at how, using AIT GmbH & Co. KG’s Smart Edge—a set of building blocks based on Microsoft Azure IoT Edge—and the appropriate hardware from MOXA Europe GmbH, the collected data can be preprocessed on the edge side and then analyzed and visualized in detail in the cloud.

executive_summary: Interoperating with Azure Machine Learning (AML), MLOps solution provider Iguazio helps companies transform their artificial intelligence (AI) projects into real-world business results. Working across Financial Services, Healthcare, Retail, Media, Entertainment and other verticals, Iguazio automates machine learning pipelines end-to-end, cutting down the time and resources needed to get data science to production. Global leader in water, hygiene, and infection prevention solutions, Ecolab, turned to Iguazio, when it sought to add predictive risk modelling to its solutions offering. Using Iguazio’s MLOps platform, Ecolab was able to accelerate production time five-fold, break down silos between data scientists, engineers and DevOps practitioners, and discover a better way to collaborate and deliver results.

title: Moving data from on-prem to cloud
executive_summary: PaySpace is an award-winning, true cloud-based Payroll and Human Capital Management software provider, with an unrivalled global footprint which includes 40 African countries.

This has led to cost savings and increased flexibility, but most importantly, it has created greater opportunities for ArcelorMittal to innovate and focus on what matters to them: inventing smarter steels for a better world.

executive_summary: With a staff of over 80,000, Ukraine-headquartered Metinvest is a major name in end-to-end steel production. Looking to improve the efficiency of its blast furnaces — reducing fuel consumption by controlling the silicon content in its iron — the company started a pilot project with Azure Data Factory and Azure Machine Learning. executive_summary: FMCG giant BIC was intent on creating the “Next BIC Thing” in shaving—personalizing the shaving experience for every customer, no matter their skin or hair type. The company partnered with Satori Analytics, who involved customers in the product innovation process from the very beginning. Using Azure technology, Satori Analytics began collecting data from thousands of shaving sessions—effectively crowd-sourcing design and usage insights thanks to thousands of volunteer users—boosting productivity, fueling R&D with ideas and pioneering a new, data-driven strategy for customer-centric care.

executive_summary: Named an “America’s Best College” in the south for more than 10 consecutive years by U.S. News & World Report, Jacksonville University is a premier private institution in northeast Florida. The university recently identified the need to have current data and analytics on areas such as student registrations, retention details, demographics, course evaluations, student engagement, and financials. The institution partnered with Trivium BI and began a shift to become data-driven, replace a lengthy and reactive process for data access, and move to a proactive and rich data culture.

Hampered by siloed systems, tools, and modes of data collection, the county turned to Microsoft Azure Synapse Analytics to create a unified data platform that delivers a more holistic view of data, faster access to data, and a clearer picture of public health metrics.

Yet, serving such a large customer base was proving to be a challenge for the company. To overcome operational issues, centralize logs, and build scalability, LinkedIn made the switch to Azure Data Explorer. Today, the professional networking site is reaping the benefits—accelerating new service onboarding, lifting its operational burden, and reducing costs.

Bridgestone offers a diverse product portfolio of premium tires and advanced solutions backed by innovative technologies. When its high-performance computing (HPC) infrastructure began to reach capacity during periods of peak usage, the company began looking into the potential of Microsoft Azure for HPC as a supplemental resource. After a successful proof of concept, Bridgestone now sees Azure for HPC as increasing the sustainability and agility of its product development process, and it’s already looking into ways to move more resources to the cloud over time.

And that number grows with every new product, with every new campaign, and with every new market. Storing this volume of data locally is unthinkable—especially for companies with global operations. That’s why Beiersdorf uses a digital asset management (DAM) system called Sharedien. Hosted in Azure, it ensures that marketing teams and all participating agencies worldwide have fast access. It eliminates the laborious search for materials—saving valuable time for everyone involved.

Firstlight Media’s mission is to help the company’s customers—multichannel video programming distributors (MVPDs), telcos, and entertainment and sports providers—deliver best-in-class content via live and video on-demand (VOD) streaming.
products: Azure Application Gateway, Azure Blob Storage, Azure Database for MySQL, Azure Event Grid, Azure Files, Azure Load Balancer

executive_summary: Charting the path to net zero and establishing what the weather is going to look like as the climate changes is a highly data-intensive task. Given these huge technological demands, The Met Office selected Microsoft as its partner using Microsoft Azure, Azure Data Lake and Cognitive Services (AI) to help it deliver the innovation and the compute resources needed to achieve its ambitious goals.

The result: investors can get under the headlines and see which specific news metrics are moving the volatile crypto market to make more informed trading decisions, while Baseline can release new features in weeks instead of months.

executive_summary: To help patients better understand surgical risks, Northumbria Healthcare NHS Foundation Trust surgeons Professor Mike Reed and Dr. Justin Green are leading a clinical team that is applying data science and machine learning to historical data on surgical outcomes to produce individualized patient risk profiles. Using Azure Machine Learning and the Responsible AI dashboard, the team works to produce results that are meaningful, fair, and easily explainable. Their work is helping patients make informed surgical decisions, and it’s helping the Trust place surgical candidates at appropriate facilities based on their risk factors.

Over the last eight years, Doctor Care Anywhere has grown to cover 2.5 million patients. Its online consultation services and digital tools enable video and phone GP appointments, employee health services, patient notes and health tracking, prescription services, referrals and people travelling abroad. Through them, Doctor Care Anywhere supports thousands of clinicians across the UK, Ireland and Australia.
products: Azure, Azure Application Gateway, Azure Application Insights, Azure Data Factory, Azure Machine Learning, Azure SQL Managed Instance

Originally created to help educate and train a rapidly modernizing workforce, Salford maintains a student-centered focus in the digital age, staying at the forefront of innovation with an emphasis on advanced technologies and robotics. While the university prides itself as a global institution with over 23,000 students from all around the world, reliance on a patchwork of legacy solutions hindered its ability to attract top global talent. To streamline the applicant journey, the University of Salford modernized their admissions and operations with Microsoft Dynamics 365 and the Power Platform to support better, faster student engagement.

Crucial to this has been the creation of an end-to-end data platform – named CAPPA – that Bridgestone is using to gain key insights into its operations and make informed decisions on current and future strategies. All to become a leading provider of digital and sustainable mobility solutions in the world.

Now the company can generate analytics quickly, and its engineers can operate remotely. HPD is seeing increased demand for its simulator as it works to offer racing teams a competitive advantage through data.
products: Azure, Azure Virtual Machines, Microsoft Teams, Windows 10, OneNote, Power BI, SharePoint

With Factory Chat, based on Microsoft Azure, customers of ASMPT SMT Solutions additionally receive an intelligent error solution database, where technicians can share their knowledge regardless of their location—and machines can even find solutions themselves for problems that arise.

executive_summary: England’s Department for Education (DfE) faced major obstacles with regards to its further education providers application process. Working with Microsoft partner Methods, the DfE used Microsoft Entra Verified ID to verify student credentials while respecting the DfE’s rigorous privacy practices. With the solution, students can apply to programmes in minutes instead of days, and it has cut down application verification times from weeks to hours. The department’s prototype credential system using Verified ID promises to optimise possibilities for young learners.

By moving to Dynamics 365 Sales, Franklin Templeton gained a deeper understanding of and more insight into its client base, while earning confidence in its future acquisition strategy.

executive_summary: For more than 100 years, Elections Ontario, a nonpartisan agency of the Legislative Assembly of Ontario, has administered the election process and the tabulation of election results in Canada’s most populous province. Ontario’s sheer size and scale translates to nearly 11 million eligible electors across 6,885 polling locations voting to elect 124 representatives during each election. While elections have fundamentally remained consistent over the last century, technological advancements have brought computers and other devices into the electoral arena.
products: Azure, Azure App Service, Azure Automation, Azure DDoS Protection, Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Managed Instance, Azure Virtual Machines, SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Entra ID

MHHCC partnered with Vervint, and they agreed that Azure’s cost effectiveness, ease of deployment, and trusted reputation made it the best choice to keep their EHR running in an outage. Now, Memorial Hospital is fully implemented, and they’ll be able to get their system running again quickly to safeguard patient data, enable HIPAA compliance, and deliver care to their community when it’s needed most.
customer: Memorial Hospital and Health Care Center
products: Azure

executive_summary: It takes a lot of time and money to plan an SAP system, build the necessary infrastructure, install software, and define databases. The software has to be installed on different SAP releases and tested accordingly in advance. Thanks to the Project Phoenix tool based on Microsoft Azure, this now happens quickly and easily in a complete SAP system at the click of a button, and is even invoiced transparently according to use.

executive_summary: Constellation (Nasdaq: CEG) is the nation’s largest producer of carbon-free energy and a leading competitive retail supplier of power and energy products and services for homes and businesses across the United States. In March 2022 Constellation announced a sustainability arrangement with Microsoft in which Microsoft will develop software to allow Constellation’s customers to match their energy use with local carbon-free energy sources, 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.

executive_summary: Wolverine Worldwide has been activating a digital shift, transitioning from reliance on legacy on-premises applications and data to a more versatile deployment in multicloud and multitenant environments. By adopting Azure Arc to manage its data and operations, Wolverine Worldwide has made quick innovation easy for its different brands. They can rapidly test, react to research, and develop potential solutions for their unique challenges by spinning up and winding down varied resources as needed.

Orbit systems help resolve the challenges of patient intake, insurance eligibility, prior authorization, document capture, claims, and payment processing. Its API-based solutions help clients easily transfer data that otherwise requires complex back-end processing.

With Azure Virtual Desktop, Agero now has the flexibility to scale its operations up and down to accommodate spikes in demand related to seasonal but unpredictable weather events, high-volume holiday travel, and other causes. Rapid scalability, coupled with the management and user experience capabilities of VMware Horizon Cloud, helps the company maintain service quality while holding down costs.

executive_summary: Telehealth provider MDLIVE for Cigna collaborated with Microsoft partner AIDAN Health (AIDAN) to develop accurate forecasts of patient demand. The company wanted to predict seasonal fluctuations of illnesses to reduce patient wait times and better balance the workloads of its medical professionals. The telehealth provider has cut patient wait times by more than 50 percent and significantly reduced the need for provider incentives during patient demand surges by using Azure Machine Learning and AIDAN forecasting.

executive_summary: The Los Angeles County Public Defender’s Office (LA County Public Defender), which provides legal defense to more than 100,000 clients yearly, used Microsoft products to pivot in a single weekend. When the Covid-19 pandemic forced offices to shut down in March 2020, LA County Public Defender worked remotely to develop cases. Clients still had to show up for court dates, and deputy public defenders had to provide legal services. To accomplish this quickly, LA County Public Defender used Microsoft 365 solutions it already owned, introducing digital collaboration and health-screening protocols. In doing so, LA County Public Defender became a model for other government entities looking to innovate and embrace technological solutions.
customer: Los Angeles County Public Defender’s Office
products: Azure, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, Power Apps, Power BI, SharePoint

It extended automation to retail services and even parcel sorting using autonomous mobile robots (AMR). Real-time service quality dashboards and automated reports help management keep track of operations. The impact is massive: heightened efficiency, increased accuracy, and saved valuable time for all employees.

executive_summary: ABB, a global tech leader in Zurich, needed a modern, flexible workplace for 105,000 employees across 330 subsidiaries. executive_summary: Urban challenges, such as ensuring safety and optimal resource usage, require a streamlined approach. As such, the eThekwini Municipality uses technology to achieve these goals. Additionally, eThekwini tackles water loss issues by streamlining data access and management with Microsoft services, generating reports in half the time. This enables proactive leak detection and faster response times, ultimately improving service delivery and resource efficiency.

executive_summary: The district of Gamle Oslo in the Norwegian capital of Oslo is always looking to provide better services to residents by directing its resources intelligently and efficiently. executive_summary: N/A

title: Vodafone amplifies call center innovation, customer service, and employee inclusion with Azure AI

title: Qanawat ensures readiness, no downtimes, scalability, and security to its payment procedures.
executive_summary: Qanawat is the leading digital mobile solutions provider in the Middle East and North Africa. Qanawat was expanding its market share in the DCB payment and wanted a reliable infrastructure partner that provides Scalability - Security – Availability. The requirement was challenging as the payment transaction should occur on time without delay and volumes may increase suddenly. To sustain its growth, Qanawat decided to migrate its on-prem infrastructure and direct carrier payment platform on Azure thus ensuring readiness, no downtimes, scalability, and security to their payment procedures Qanawat Digital FZC Qanawat (meaning ‘Channels’ in Arabic) is the leading digital mobile solutions provider in the Middle East and North Africa. Founded in 2001 and headquartered in Dubai, UAE, they are strategically partnering with 40+ Mobile Network Operators, 10+ Digital Platforms, 700+ Merchants, content providers and Technology companies. Qanawat is the biggest Digital Music and Online Content aggregator in Pan Arabic Region being a reference company for Mobile Network Operators, Digital Content Merchants, and their customers. The aim at Qanawat Digital is to support people and organizations and leverage the full potential of innovative mobile solutions by being the platform that allows Digital Content Merchants to reach their public target and allow the consumers to get the desired content and pay for it using their phone credit.

title: The Children’s Mercy Kansas City Research Institute enhances pediatric research collaboration and sample sharing using Microsoft technology
executive_summary: As a pediatric healthcare organization focused on a translational approach to research, the Children’s Mercy Kansas City Research Institute (CMRI) aimed to accelerate its research capabilities through cloud-based collaboration. Investigators studying high-risk pregnancies wanted to provide greater visibility to their perinatal sample collection. In response, CMRI developed the Perinatal Research Biorepository (PRB) Query Tool, offering researchers access to de-identified sample data. The PRB Query Tool uses Microsoft Power BI for data visualization and Microsoft Azure for cloud-based storage. The resulting solution improves research speed and accuracy by integrating data from more than 4,550 samples and more than 500 participants.
products: Azure, Azure Data Factory, Microsoft Entra ID, Power BI

title: Mount Sinai remains at the cutting edge of medicine with Epic on Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: Mount Sinai Health System needed to migrate their on-premises Epic environment to the cloud to keep their hospitals and medical schools at the cutting-edge of care. After partnering with Accenture, they chose the Microsoft Azure Cloud to facilitate data collaboration across their workloads and adopt a reference architecture that was purpose-built for Epic. Now, Mount Sinai can support changes in capacity during events like the pandemic, even as they migrate. Once in full production, they can enable HIPAA compliance in outages and more easily adopt the latest electronic health records (EHR) technologies—ensuring a better patient experience and securing their status as a leader in innovative care.

title: Apex Digital Solutions delivers seamless communication on Microsoft Teams to Michigan Humane, reducing costs and improving services
executive_summary: Michigan Humane, the largest and oldest non-profit animal welfare organization in Michigan, needed to modernize its communication and collaboration tools to better serve multiple sites. Apex Digital Solutions provided a comprehensive solution that included Microsoft Teams Phone, Microsoft Teams Rooms, Microsoft Azure, and Microsoft 365, enabling Michigan Humane to establish reliable site-to-site communication, expand its community engagement programs, and improve advocacy efforts. As a result, Michigan Humane has been able to provide better services to animals and people in need, increase staff productivity, and achieve significant cost savings on communication expenses.

title: MHI uses ARO to standardize systems and create common components and drives DX as a leader in engineering and manufacturing
executive_summary: As a leading engineering and manufacturing company, Mitsubishi Heavy Industries (MHI) is accelerating the use of containers. The main goal of using containers is to standardize its system development and use common components to quickly and flexibly create a development platform.

title: Eurobank uses the Enterprise Skills Initiative to create personalized learning journeys
executive_summary: Eurobank, a robust financial organization based in Greece and operating in 6 countries, embraces excellence through targeted learning and personal development initiatives for its people. Through personalized learning and training paths, curated in collaboration with Microsoft, Eurobank lays the groundwork for a successful migration of its IT assets to Azure.

title: Enreach cuts down time-to-market with Microsoft Teams Operator Connect Accelerator
executive_summary: Enreach is a leading European unified communications provider that empowers businesses to stay connected, no matter where they are. The company wanted to boost its customers’ success and partnered with AudioCodes Live Cloud, which is based on Azure, to implement Microsoft Teams Operator Connect. Now, Enreach onboards new customers faster and easier than ever. And with the right tools for simplified solution management, Enreach has reduced time-to-market.
products: Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Teams Rooms, Microsoft Teams Phone, Power Automate

title: Microsoft Power BI Supports the Construction of Business Digitalization in SVW
executive_summary: The construction of a digital ecosystem is the key to accelerating the digital transformation of enterprises; through data visualization, data analysis and data application, empowering business digitization, accelerating the product innovation, improving operational efficiency, and making value adding for customers. During the process of business innovation, cultivate employees' digital capabilities and realize digital transformation of employees, providing continuously self-driven development of enterprises.
products: Microsoft 365, Power BI

title: Cognizant embraces remote work with Microsoft Intune and Windows Autopilot
executive_summary: When the pandemic hit, Cognizant had the tools it needed to deal with the worst-case scenario. With a process that does not require on-premises infrastructure, Autopilot can securely provision devices over an internet connection. Cognizant’s IT teams were quickly able to transition to remote provisioning and ensure that the company’s associates could productively work from home.

title: Dell Technologies unlocks new connections and streamlines work with Microsoft Viva Topics
executive_summary: When Sandra Murtagh, Vice President of Global Sales Learning and Development at Dell Technologies, and Karen Butcher, Head of the Global Sales Learning and Development Transformation Office at Dell Technologies, launched a transformation office within the Dell learning and development organization, the goal was to orient the sales function toward the future. They focused on delivering great experiences and integrating their learning platform with Microsoft Teams, where sellers will be able to access training content at the moment of need. Viva Topics emerged as the next logical step. Turning to Viva Topics to uncover knowledge from within the apps they use every day leads Dell sales employees to forge new connections with colleagues.
products: Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Viva, Microsoft Viva Topics

title: PPC Greece energizes its business processes and sustainability with Azure
executive_summary: Headquartered in Athens, Public Power Corporation (PPC) is the country’s largest electric power company, servicing more than seven million customers. Since 2019, PPC has been focusing on innovation through digital solution, with the goal to transform itself into a modern, data-driven organization. By adopting Microsoft Azure-based solutions, the company has reduced its total cost of ownership by 30 percent and cut carbon emissions by 99.84 percent.
products: Azure

title: Sakata Seed America sows Innovation with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: Sakata Seed America, Inc. (Sakata) is a wholly owned subsidiary of Sakata Seed Corporation of Yokohama, Japan. Sakata breeds, produces, and sells wholesale vegetables and ornamental genetics through seeds and plant cuttings. For more than forty years, Sakata has worked to meet the industry’s needs for high quality seed, strong performance, and excellent yields, as well as retail and consumer demand for delicious fruit and vegetables. They are actively involved in the development of new and improved plant varieties that are ideally suited to a wide range of environments around the world. Sakata continues to be an industry leader for innovation, quality, reliability, and service. It’s not surprising that Sakata’s overseas operations have earned them a reputation for quality in over 130 countries.

title: Norway’s OBOS builds premier customer engagement model with Dynamics 365 Customer Insights and Marketing
executive_summary: Nothing is quite as personal as our homes. Jobs change, relationships happen, families grow. When the region’s largest housing developer is a member-owned cooperative, the personal nature of the business takes on a new meaning. Established in 1929, OBOS engages not only in the development and sale of homes and properties, but banking and financial solutions, property management, real estate brokerage, and other forms of service production in the housing and property sector. The Oslo-based organization is a cooperative owned by its approximately 550,000 members, and all post-tax profits are reinvested in the organization to achieve the goal of building quality homes for its members.
products: Azure, Dynamics 365 Customer Insights - Data

title: Walmart Finance standardizes on Power BI for reporting and analytics
executive_summary: As the world’s leading retailer—supporting approximately 10,500 stores and clubs and 2.3 million associates worldwide — it’s no surprise Walmart has a vast amount of data to process. With trillions of transactions come challenges around data centralization, preparation, and consumption. The Walmart finance organization has chosen to standardize on Microsoft Power BI to create an agile, scalable, and cost-effective reporting and analytics solution.
products: Power BI

title: Enhancing learning outcomes and empowering teachers with Microsoft
executive_summary: Brunei’s Lambak Kanan Jalan 49 Primary School has been at the forefront of digital transformation in education. By participating in the Digital Classroom initiative and the Microsoft Showcase Incubator Programme and relying on Microsoft 365, and Windows devices, the school has helped its 50 teachers earn the Microsoft Innovative Educators (MIEE) certification. “The program has empowered us to bring leadership, learning, and technology together and build a safe, secure, optimized, and efficient school,” shares Hajah Noorliah, the school’s Headmistress.
products: Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams

title: Indonesian university creates game-changing courses for higher education with Azure-based solutions
executive_summary: Universitas Terbuka collaborating with 9 other universities in Indonesia offers open and distance learning opportunities through its Indonesia Cyber Education Institute (ICE Institute). It decided to expand its courses to offer game development, driven by the Indonesian government’s commitment to growing the country’s pool of digital talents. Together with Microsoft and partner PCMan, the institution delivered an Azure-based platform, which now gives the chance for fully-fledged games to be developed for the market.
products: Azure, Microsoft 365

title: SysCorp automates payroll tax calculation using KAISPE’s FlexPayroll, built on Microsoft Dynamics 365
executive_summary: SysCorp, a technology solutions provider in Uganda, has been serving the needs of small and medium-sized businesses in the region since 1988. A recent challenge for the company’s customers involved manual payroll tax calculation, which was time-consuming and prone to error. SysCorp collaborated with Microsoft partner KAISPE, whose FlexPayroll add-in for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance automated the calculation process. This resulted in a 90 percent improvement in operational efficiency, and SysCorp's customers were able to comply with regulatory requirements.
products: Dynamics 365 Finance

title: Dish TV boosts platform performance by 2x with Microsoft technology and Unified Support
executive_summary: Dish TV India Limited(DishTV) is India’s leading direct-to-home (DTH) Company and owns multiple individual brands like Dish TV, Zing, and d2h under its umbrella. The company benefits from numerous satellite platforms, including SES8, GSAT-15 and ST-2. DishTV has more than 750 channels and services, including 31 audio channels and 81 HD channels and services on its platform. The company has a vast distribution network of over 2,700 distributors and around 2,40,000 dealers across 9,300 towns in India. DishTV is connected with its pan India customer base through call centers that are spread across 22 cities and are equipped to handle customer queries all-round-the-clock in 12 different languages.

executive_summary: As a pediatric healthcare organization focused on a translational approach to research, the Children’s Mercy Kansas City Research Institute (CMRI) aimed to accelerate its research capabilities through cloud-based collaboration. Now, Enreach onboards new customers faster and easier than ever. And with the right tools for simplified solution management, Enreach has reduced time-to-market.

title: Microsoft 365 F Plan deployed to 9,000 beauty professionals in Shiseido’s company-wide communication transformation using Teams
executive_summary: Shiseido is making efforts to transform communication methods for approximately 9,000 beauty professionals throughout the country. With the 150th anniversary of Shiseido’s founding in October 2022, the name Beauty Consultant (BC), who handles customer reception and service at stores in Japan, were changed to “Personal Beauty Partner (PBP)”. This was an evolution from the former “Consultants who communicate methods to attain beauty as leaders in beauty” to “Partners who work together with customers to attain their ideal beauty”. At the same time, in accordance with the medium-to-long-term strategy “WIN 2023 and Beyond” launched in 2021, the communication infrastructure used by PBPs was renewed to accelerate the digital transformation to swiftly respond to the ever-changing market environment, and Shiseido adopted the Microsoft 365 F Plan license, which is geared toward front-line workers. PBPs were all given individual email addresses, and by using Microsoft Teams for chat and online meetings, they were enabled to have swift communications with all employees when necessary. We asked Shiseido about the goals with this time’s communication transformation and the results they have achieved up to this point.

title: Atrium improves efficiency and cuts 80 percent of costs with Microsoft Power Apps and SAP on Azure
executive_summary: From 40 to just six days for crucial approvals and 80 percent cost-savings after a shift to the cloud: Atrium Quality Contractors isn't just building Egypt's landmarks; it's redefining construction management. As the prominent arm of Talaat Moustafa Group, Egypt's largest publicly listed real estate developer, Atrium focuses on innovating every facet of its business. From using Power Apps to digitize business workflows to migrating SAP on Azure to streamline construction-related processes, the contractor turned a manual workflow nightmare into a breeze, saving 60 percent of day-to-day team efforts. On top of it, it brought business continuity, scalability, and high cybersecurity.
products: Azure AI Bot Service, Azure AI Services, Azure AI Language, Microsoft 365 Enterprise, Microsoft Teams, Power Automate, Power BI

title: ​​DXC streamlines IT management, improves visibility, unites a global estate with Microsoft Security solutions​
executive_summary: When you’re the company other companies turn to for management of their most pivotal systems, it’s important to get everything right. That’s especially true when many of those customers are iconic Fortune 500 corporations and large public service organizations across the globe. When DXC Technology embarked on a sweeping transformation of its internal global IT estate, it turned to Microsoft Security solutions, rolling out Microsoft Sentinel and making full use of Microsoft Defender. It fine-tunes user access and compliance with Microsoft Entra ID and the Microsoft Purview solutions to better protect its irreplaceable intellectual property and streamline management of every part of its vast estate.
products: Azure, Microsoft Entra ID, Microsoft Defender XDR, Microsoft Intune, Microsoft Purview, Microsoft Purview Compliance Manager, Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management, Microsoft Sentinel, SharePoint

title: Decentriq unlocks highly secure collaboration on the world’s most sensitive datasets with Azure confidential computing
executive_summary: Companies that work with sensitive data are often sitting on a wealth of information they’re restricted from using, but Decentriq is helping these companies tap into the value of this data—without sharing it. Founded in 2019, the Swiss company offers an enterprise-grade software as a service platform for confidential data collaboration. On the platform, participants can create data clean rooms, which are neutral spaces for multiple parties to work on joint datasets where compliance, control, and data confidentiality are enforced by advanced privacy technologies. With its data clean rooms, Decentriq is not only making data collaboration simpler, but in many cases, it’s also creating the opportunity for multiple groups to come together and use sensitive data for the first time—using Microsoft Azure confidential computing. Since migrating to the cloud and accelerating its confidential computing journey with Azure, the company has made collaboration on sensitive datasets scalable for the first time and helped customers reach a range of milestones, including doubling clickthrough rates for digital advertising. And this is just the beginning.

title: The cutting edge in hospitality: Saudi Airlines Catering Company automates 11 processes with Power Apps, with more to come
executive_summary: Saudi Airlines Catering Company has an enduring commitment to continuous improvement. Recognizing the need to modernize, its leaders embarked on a transformative journey, using Microsoft Power Apps to automate and streamline data processing operations. From digitizing manual data collection to creating a suite of business applications, the company notably reduced reliance on paper, saving the business card printing cost by replacing it with the digital business card app. Moreover, real-time dashboards empower everyone to make data-driven decisions, enabling the company to deliver value to its customers quickly.

title: Building a Platform To Promote Data Utilization by SMEs with Azure PaaS, FORVAL’s “Kiduna PARK” Aims for Aggressive DX
executive_summary: FORVAL provides management consulting and IT consulting services to revitalize small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). The company is also active in digital transformation (DX) initiatives and uses the results of DX promoted within the company to provide DX support to SMEs seeking to effectively utilize digital technologies. As part of these initiatives, the management information analysis platform “Kiduna PARK” was released on October 10, 2021 (Digital Day). The goal is not only to "visualize" the business conditions of SMEs and serve as a foothold for DX promotion, but also to link accumulated corporate information and create new businesses through co-creation. To build “Kiduna PARK,” which is based on the concept of an integrated database infrastructure for SMEs, Azure Active Directory B2C (Azure AD B2C) — PaaS service of Microsoft Azure — and Microsoft Power BI Embedded were used. “Kiduna PARK” is an aggressive DX for FORVAL. In other words, it is positioned as a challenge to continue to transform the businesses and to fundamentally change the way of delivering value.
products: Azure, Power BI Embedded, Microsoft Entra ID, Power BI

title: Sameday delivers a fresh employee experience with Microsoft Viva
executive_summary: Sameday, a rapidly growing Romanian courier company, aims to be the largest and most popular in the Balkans—delivering goods across Europe within 24 hours. To extend its vision of innovation to the entire company, Sameday designed an intranet that combines Viva Engage and Viva Connections. The platform streamlined internal communications and performance tracking, saving employees time and enabling the company to grow faster than its competition. With Microsoft's help, Sameday is building a strong foundation for a collaborative, meaningful, and efficient work environment.
products: Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Viva Connections, Microsoft Viva Engage, Microsoft Viva Goals, Microsoft Viva Learning

title: Business scaling 101: EDUardo enhances business education experiences and serves thousands of users with Azure
executive_summary: With its learning platform built around its interactive business simulations, EDUardo is revolutionizing the business learning landscape. Based in Budapest, Hungary, the company offers interactive and practical business courses that empower course participants with new skills. Confronted with scalability issues, it transitioned from unreliable on-premises servers to Microsoft Azure, reducing downtime to only 48 minutes a year. EDUardo’s distinctive business courses were also made available on the Azure Marketplace, empowering thousands of professionals to upskill through immersive learning.

title: LG Uplus is building a social media-based digital communication platform with Viva Engage
executive_summary: LG Uplus Corp. decided to introduce Microsoft Viva Engage to enhance employee communication. With Viva Engage, LG Uplus added a social media-based communication platform to the collaboration environment, in addition to email, Microsoft 365 document collaboration tools, and Microsoft Teams. By introducing Viva Engage, LG Uplus could build an easy-to-access digital communication platform where employees can get to know about internal campaigns, share knowledge, and engage with each other with comfort and ease.
products: Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Viva Engage

title: From siloed teams to a global collaboration culture - Arvato is undergoing a culture change supported by Microsoft 365
executive_summary: Arvato, a leader in global supply chain management, needed to standardize platforms across its worldwide network of locations and reporting for external clients and internal parties alike. The company embraced Microsoft Teams and Microsoft Power BI to create a more transparent, connected organization and modernize the time-consuming process of compiling business-critical reports. Today, Arvato has established a global culture of collaboration and a higher transparency towards its clients through the introduction of the Microsoft Modern Workplace – especially through Teams and Power BI.

title: Midmark improves performance by up to 75 percent by migrating and running Oracle on Azure
executive_summary: Midmark Corporation, a company committed to transforming healthcare experiences through innovative design, faces an explosion of on-premises data following each new acquisition and product development. With its increasing need for a storage and performance solution, it evaluated a move to the cloud with Microsoft Azure. To unlock flexibility and scalability and replace infrastructure nearing end of support, the company has been moving its business-critical Oracle environments, including Oracle E-Business Suite, to Azure using Azure DevOps pipelines and Terraform code. Midmark is using better and faster processors and hardware, which is helping improve performance by up to 75 percent. Far exceeding expectations, the company now expects to use more Azure capabilities beyond Oracle on Azure.
products: Azure, Azure Application Gateway, Oracle on Azure, Microsoft Entra ID

title: Backbase seeks to usher in a new era of engagement banking with its Grand Central platform and Azure API Management
executive_summary: Backbase, a leading force in the banking industry, is spearheading the future of banking through its revolutionary Grand Central platform powered by Azure API Management and the leading banking domain model BIAN. With commitment to innovation and customer-centric solutions, Backbase is empowering financial institutions to navigate the evolving landscape of banking with agility and efficiency.
products: Azure API Management, Azure Service Bus

title: Prosegur Cash drives efficiencies and employee empowerment through an omnichannel Microsoft Dynamics 365 platform
executive_summary: Prosegur Cash is a Spanish provider of cash management solutions with presence in 31 countries around the world. Serving thousands of people from Spain to Germany, Argentina and Brazil, the company sees customer experience as key to its success – and is using cloud technology to deliver it. Powered by Microsoft, Prosegur has embarked on a digital transformation journey centered around creating a new CRM platform for its sales and customer services teams. The initiative has been a huge success – allowing Prosegur Cash to create a new omnichannel platform and empower its workforce to deliver better services. Ultimately driving customer satisfaction across its global network.

title: EKZ workplace becomes “overwhelmingly positive” with Microsoft Surface devices
executive_summary: One of Switzerland’s largest energy suppliers, Elektrizitätswerke des Kantons Zürich (EKZ), wanted to provide its 1,400 employees with a more modern device experience, and to eliminate the high costs of their legacy device-management strategy. Microsoft Surface devices with Windows 11 Pro enable more flexible and productive work environments for EKZ employees, while Windows Autopilot simplifies the configuration, deployment, and ongoing management of the devices with a zero-touch experience for IT.
products: Windows Autopilot

title: Inovalon reaches enterprise-wide objectives and empowers employees with Microsoft Viva Goals
executive_summary: Inovalon, a leading provider of cloud-based software solutions empowering data-driven healthcare, had disparate tools and a reactive approach to goal setting. The business searched for an objectives and key results platform that could help teams align on enterprise-wide goals and keep key objectives front and center throughout the year. The business implemented Microsoft Viva Goals in 90 days and reached 100% of enterprise-wide objectives in the first year.

title: Idemitsu Kosan says goodbye to ADFS through switching authentication infrastructure to Microsoft Entra ID in pursuit of diverse work styles
executive_summary: Idemitsu Kosan is known as a company that manufactures and sells fuel oil such as gasoline, kerosene, light oil, and heavy oil, but is actually engaged in a wide range of businesses, including manufacture and sale of basic chemicals, such as olefin (ethylene, propylene, and butadiene) and aroma chemicals, and lubricating oil. In recent years, in order to achieve carbon neutrality, Idemitsu Kosan is working on the generation of synthetic fuels that are free of carbon dioxide emissions, manufacture of sustainable aviation fuel (SAF), and use of ammonia as a fuel.
products: Microsoft 365, Microsoft Entra, Microsoft Intune

title: CompuData grows 25% year over year, increases cloud revenue by 250% by migrating from private cloud to Microsoft Azure with Ingram Micro
executive_summary: IT solutions provider CompuData migrated its legacy infrastructure to Microsoft Azure, increasing its cloud revenue by 250% and making its growth sustainable while maintaining regulatory compliance. When CompuData found that maintaining a private cloud infrastructure was becoming too complex and costly as the company grew, it looked to Azure for scalability and efficiency. CompuData worked with Microsoft partner Ingram Micro to transition all its customers and applications to Azure through the Microsoft DCO program. As a result, CompuData is scaling faster, reducing costs, and growing by 25% year over year.

title: EPAM reimagines sales with Dynamics 365 and Microsoft Copilot for Sales
executive_summary: EPAM Systems Inc. (NYSE: EPAM) is a leading digital transformation services and product engineering company. Since 1993, EPAM has used its software engineering expertise to provide cloud, consultancy, and AI-enabled transformation services for global clients ranging from enterprise leaders to ambitious startups. EPAM’s more than 50,000 employees across 55 countries engage locally to deliver solutions such as custom software development and cybersecurity to digital strategy and design, helping fuel each client’s competitive advantage, speed their time to market, and derive greater value from innovations and technology investments.
products: Dynamics 365 Sales, Microsoft Copilot for Sales

title: Cancer Council NSW fights cancer securely with Intune and Microsoft Defender for Endpoint
executive_summary: To better meet the needs of Australians fighting cancer and to prevent disease in the future, Cancer Council NSW upgraded its technology. The organization worked with Microsoft partner cubesys to strengthen its security posture and better manage employee devices. Now, Cancer Council NSW has the confidence its teams can better support people in the field securely.

title: Backbase seeks to usher in a new era of engagement banking with its Grand Central platform and Azure API Management
executive_summary: Backbase, a leading force in the banking industry, is spearheading the future of banking through its revolutionary Grand Central platform powered by Azure API Management and the leading banking domain model BIAN. With commitment to innovation and customer-centric solutions, Backbase is empowering financial institutions to navigate the evolving landscape of banking with agility and efficiency.

title: Prosegur Cash drives efficiencies and employee empowerment through an omnichannel Microsoft Dynamics 365 platform
executive_summary: Prosegur Cash is a Spanish provider of cash management solutions with presence in 31 countries around the world. Serving thousands of people from Spain to Germany, Argentina and Brazil, the company sees customer experience as key to its success – and is using cloud technology to deliver it. In the pharmaceutical field, the company focuses its research and development in three areas: oncology, allergy/immunology, and urology. In the consumer healthcare field, it manufactures and sells products that are familiar and closely related to people’s daily lives, such as nutritional drinks, gastrointestinal medicines, troches (lozenges), and virus removal and antibacterial sprays.

title: Kyunghee Girls’ Middle School in South Korea is providing future-oriented learning experience to its students with Microsoft 365 and Surface

title: Watts, a creator of smart energy-tracking applications, uses Azure to help customers bring sustainability home
executive_summary: Watts, a Danish energy technology company, was inspired by EU legislation on climate change to create an energy-tracking application for domestic use. The result, Watts Energy Assistant, was the first of several products that Watts launched to help boost sustainability in the home. From the beginning, the small team utilized the Microsoft Azure platform to support all their applications and services, including Azure IoT Hub, Data Lake Storage, and Azure Databricks. Their “Microsoft for everything” approach helped the company scale up quickly to meet growing demand, reduce costs, and maintain a strict security posture, including General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) compliance. Today, use of Watts products has grown exponentially, and the business continues to grow, with more services planned for the future.

By implementing Dynamics 365 Finance and Dynamics 365 Operations, Ukrenergo built a transactional digital core and became more resilient in its daily operations to ensure it could adapt to changes in any situation.

executive_summary: Opened in 2017, the LEGO House in Denmark is the ultimate LEGO experience center for children and adults. In 2023, facing challenges with an array of custom-built digital experiences served from an aging on-prem data center, it began upgrading with Microsoft Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). This shift to a cloud-based approach improved experience uptime and stability and will enable LEGO House to quickly update and innovate upon these experiences as the house learns from its guests. As the destination modernizes all its interactive experiences it hopes to share learnings and technologies with the broader LEGO Group ecosystem, like LEGOLAND and brand retail stores.

executive_summary: A leader in life sciences for 160 years, Bayer has more than 100,000 employees working toward its mission of “Health for all, hunger for none.” Bayer employees are using emerging technologies, including generative AI and Microsoft Copilot, to contribute to feeding a growing global population and helping people lead healthier, disease-free lives. After looking into the topic of generative AI at Bayer, more than 700 areas of application were collected, and that number is growing.
products: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365

title: BT Group helps customers connect “for good” seamlessly and safely with Microsoft Entra ID
executive_summary: Global telecommunications company BT Group believes that When people connect, there’s no limit to the good they can do. It takes pride in providing excellent customer service that makes those connections as easy and secure as possible. BT Group also anticipates evolving from a traditional telco to what it calls a “tech-co” by providing access to a variety of new products and services, some of which may be from third parties as incremental revenue streams; including offering ID-as-a-Service to other platform providers. Crucial to that ambition is seamless authentication, but the previous registration experience entailed a frustratingly time-consuming process. Customers had to repeatedly input their information for every service they wanted to access. To close the gap between that experience and its vision, BT Group created its single authentication framework based on Microsoft Entra ID, Microsoft Security solutions, and Microsoft Azure technologies, building a new ID platform named for its primary consumer brand, EE ID. Just weeks after deployment, dramatically lower registration abandonment, more than 5 million customers on board, and the thwarting of nearly 100 thousand malicious attacks bear out the wisdom of that innovation.

As a result, Eduvos has gained real-time insights, allowing it to run more smoothly and deliver more learning opportunities to students in South Africa. With Microsoft 365 and Azure, the institution also streamlined student interactions, from enrolment to course completion, thus bringing a more satisfying educational experience.

title: LTIMindtree prevents security breaches with Microsoft Defender Experts for Hunting
executive_summary: LTIMindtree is a global technology consulting and digital solutions company that enables enterprises across industries to reimagine business models, accelerate innovation, and maximize growth by harnessing digital technologies. The company wanted the ability to perform proactive threat hunting beyond the usual endpoints and extend detection to identity, email, and cloud apps. Additionally, it wanted to improve the efficiency of its SOC team by optimizing in-house resources for proactive hunting coverage, so the team could focus on other critical SOC activities. LTIMindtree turned to Microsoft for a solution and implemented Microsoft Defender Experts for Hunting, a human-led managed service designed to augment a SOC’s threat hunting capabilities to prioritize significant threats. Within a couple of months after implementing Microsoft Defender Experts for Hunting, LTIMindtree received at least six notifications that they otherwise wouldn’t have, which were critical for taking remediation action at the initial stages and protecting the company from an escalated threat.

In a single, organized platform, Cognite Data Fusion® makes data consumable by providing a holistic, nuanced view of all existing data, enabling customers to take meaningful action to drive sustainability.

title: Humana consolidates 47 data sources and BI tools into a singular Power BI and Azure solution
executive_summary: After surveying the analytics professionals utilizing digital health and analytics data, Humana discovered that it had 47 disparate data sources and BI tools used throughout the company. With Power BI, Humana adapted on the fly and continues to collaborate even as everyone works from home, a critical capability now.

executive_summary: Finland’s largest healthcare provider, HUS, has created an end-to-end test, track, and trace system that is helping to combat the spread of COVID-19. Using a variety of services from Microsoft Cloud for Healthcare, the system takes Finnish citizens from a health bot for self-assessment through the booking of tests, the dissemination of results, and the contacting of those who may have also been contaminated. The data that is collected and used to power the system is compliant with Finnish security and privacy legislation and is informing research efforts to understand how the virus is contracted and spread. HUS’s longstanding commitment to the digitization of services meant that a foundation was already in place so the end-to-end service could be rolled out quickly. It has undoubtedly saved many lives, as well as prevented the strongest lockdown measures, which would inevitably have harmed the Finnish economy.

executive_summary: For almost 40 years, Moneysworth & Best Quality Shoe Care has developed and distributed shoe care and foot care products to retailers across North America, offering the largest and most comprehensive shoe care assortment in the industry, worldwide. Owners at the family-run business wanted to streamline business processes, optimize operations, and provide better work-life balance for company leadership and employees, so Moneysworth & Best replaced an on-premises enterprise resource planning solution with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central. As a result, the company now uses cloud-based tools to react quickly to changing markets, work smarter, and perform better with real-time business insights.

Nissin Foods Holdings plans to continue using Power Platform as it expands its insourcing initiatives across a range of applications employing the latest technology.
products: Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, Power Apps

executive_summary: Yapı Kredi, the leading name of Turkish finance sector, enhances its data assisted management culture by capitalizing on business intelligence across all units via Power BI.

executive_summary: Leading the banking sector in Türkiye with a digital banking active customer penetration of 89 percent, Yapı Kredi increases data security by using the Microsoft 365 E5 Information Protection solution. Leading the banking sector in Türkiye with a digital banking active customer penetration of 89 percent, Yapı Kredi increases data security by using the Microsoft 365 E5 Information Protection solution.

For years, UniCredit had to handle a wide range of IT environments across the group, which made it challenging to engage with its workforce and unlock its full potential. This all changed in 2021, when the organization launched a company-wide digital transformation program aimed at migrating to the cloud and implementing shared collaboration tools with Microsoft’s help.

executive_summary: System Cleaners, a Danish company that supplies open-plant cleaning solutions to the global food and beverage industry, sought a real-time view of its pipeline and greater transparency for customer data. The platform’s seamless integration with other Microsoft products, such as Dynamics 365 Business Central, Planner, Teams, SharePoint, Outlook, and Power BI, has been crucial for Systems Cleaners’ business success in the midst of a global pandemic. With iGlobe CRM, System Cleaners has the digital foundation to manage 2,500 front-end engineers, service technicians, and sales reps, and to use business insights to ensure continued growth.

title: Search is a vital skill: How Napier Boys’ High School uses Microsoft’s Search Coach to improve digital literacy and research
executive_summary: Situated in New Zealand, Napier Boys’ High School has been a leading secondary school for over 125 years, blending respect, honesty, and integrity with a 21st century approach to education. Napier’s faculty strives to prepare the boys to become informed and successful future citizens. Nowhere is this better exemplified than in classrooms where educators teach digital literacy and online research skills. However, prioritizing these skills has been difficult given the pressures of the pandemic and the unique rural student body Napier serves. When one of Napier’s technology leaders discovered Search Coach, a learning tool built into Microsoft Teams for Education, he was excited to use this tool to train students how to identify reliable resources and write more useful search queries—to figure out what online sources of information are credible, and to quickly improve their digital research skills.

title: Bedrosians Tile & Stone enhances scalability with Dynamics 365

Bedrosians has been providing tile and setting materials to contractors and builders for 75 years. Through Bedrosians.com, distribution centers, and their own trucking operations, Bedrosians delivers the on-trend, high-quality products they are known for, at affordable prices.

The centralized, single pane of glass solution has greatly improved efficiency and security while reducing operating costs.
products: Azure Arc, Azure Monitor, Microsoft Purview, SQL Server

This solution now serves as a blueprint for scaling across the enterprise, supporting a finance transformation toward data-based decision-making at all levels in the organization.

Saphyre uses AI, automation, and networking to save time and effort in pre-trade, make T+1 compliance possible, support efficient information and document management, and secure counterparty collaboration. It also reduces post-trade settlement issues and customers’ manual efforts by 75%, helping clients to be ready to trade up to five times faster.

title: A lesson in resilience and innovation
executive_summary: “It’s difficult to see COVID-19 as a catalyst, but I can’t imagine we will ever go back to where we were before the pandemic,” says David McClymont, IT Director at Downe House School.

Symend benefits from the global reach of Azure, standing up new regional instances in less than two weeks without needing to rearchitect infrastructure. Telecommunications clients have seen fivefold click-through rate increases on customer outreach.

title: Innovating banking efficiency: National Bank of Greece transforms operations with Microsoft Azure AI Document Intelligence

It added other Azure products and Microsoft Security solutions to help protect and enhance the platform. With its move to Azure, ClearBank gained both scalability and efficiency. It now pushes out 183% more monthly system releases and has a robust, reliable platform to support the latest banking products and services for financial institutions.

executive_summary: Aerospace pioneer Airbus innovates constantly, meeting the needs of its aerospace and defense customers with complex, cutting-edge solutions. title: Homepoint sets data in motion to streamline loan processing with Confluent on Azure

Confluent has helped Homepoint tackle long-standing business challenges, lower costs by $800K monthly, improve the efficiency of key processes by 20 percent, and increase the pace of deployments by 40 percent.

title: SelfPay ensures the availability of the payment solutions’ infrastructure with Azure

To keep pace with growing transaction volumes—which often go up by 25 percent during holiday seasons—SelfPay sought to increase both processing power and scalability. This became a necessity following the COVID-19 health crisis and associated sanitary recommendations to privilege contactless transactions. By moving its databases to the Microsoft Azure cloud platform, the company tripled its transaction volume-handling capabilities, ensuring reliable, highly secure, and efficient payments service availability for people across Romania.
