title: American Engineering Testing (AET) builds a foundation on Dynamics 365
executive_summary: American Engineering Testing (AET) is a premier provider of geotechnical engineering, construction materials testing and engineering, environmental consulting, building performance, petrography and chemistry, and specialized laboratory services. Since 1974, the employee-owned firm has provided critical investigation, analysis, and engineering consulting services that deliver certainty in a field that leaves no room for error, helping structure owners, contractors, and materials suppliers perform at their best from planning and design to successful project completion.

title: Hoshizaki chooses Microsoft Azure Sphere to power the data collection mechanism of IoT commercial refrigerators and other equipment
executive_summary: General food service equipment manufacturer HOSHIZAKI CORPORATION (“Hoshizaki”) launched Hoshizaki Connect Wi-Fi in Japan in January 2024. This solution automatically creates temperature records to comply with revised Food Sanitation Act and enables quick detection and response to failures while leveraging Microsoft Azure Sphere for data collection at no initial cost*. An all-in-one chip enables Hoshizaki to manufacture edge devices at low cost while maintaining safety with 10 years of security updates. NSW Inc. (“NSW”) assists as a development partner with an exemplary track record in IoT-related systems. A notable part of development was a large-scale proof of concept (PoC) project wherein Hoshizaki tested 1,700 pieces of equipment to produce a highly scalable system on Microsoft Azure.

title: PAGOS360 opted for automation with trak.e and Azure
executive_summary: As a payment service provider, PAGOS360 faced the challenge of complying with due diligence and Know Your Customer (KYC) policies when processing millions of transactions daily. These processes were done manually until sustained growth led it to find a solution to automate these tasks. The scalability of the business required the solution to be deployed in the cloud, and to provide security and trust to both the company and its customers. For this reason, PAGOS360 chose trak.e from Poincenot Technology Studio, a solution based on Microsoft Azure.

title: Jashanmal National Company brings scale, security, and speed to retail with Dynamics 365 Commerce
executive_summary: For more than a century, Jashanmal National Company has been a retail giant across the Gulf Cooperation Council countries. But with more than 150 stores and a sprawling distribution network, its on-premises retail management system could not keep up with the pace of expansion. With a strategic shift to Dynamics 365 Commerce, supported by Intwo, JNC not only streamlined its vast operations but also enhanced security and operational efficiency.

title: For Lander & Rogers, seamless integration and 78% faster deployments with Surface complement hybrid work
executive_summary: Lander & Rogers, an influential Australian law firm with a practice spanning a broad spectrum of sectors and industries, needed to upgrade its fleet of devices to meet the demands of both remote and in-office work. The Surface Laptop empowered the firm to follow modern deployment and management strategies—and with Microsoft Intune and Autopilot, it reduced deployment time from 3 hours to 40 minutes.

title: Stiftung Diakoniewerk Kropp streamlines behind-the-scenes healthcare work with the Microsoft cloud
executive_summary: Stiftung Diakoniewerk Kropp runs healthcare facilities across Northern Germany, helping people with everything from mental health to hospice services. Yet with an IT staff of just five supporting 2,000 employees, the nonprofit needed to modernize its technology infrastructure. When Stiftung Diakoniewerk Kropp migrated to Microsoft Azure, it saved money by adopting Microsoft apps, gained the flexibility to scale up cloud resources as needed, and boosted employee productivity—all while adhering to strict EU security and privacy guidelines.

title: The transformation of FS amidst the pandemic supported by Microsoft 365
executive_summary: FS, Brazil's first and largest ethanol producer that uses 100% corn to manufacture of its products, has always sought to use technology as an additional resource to transform agribusiness. Almost all of its systems operate in the cloud, for example, making processes more agile and efficient and adding value to its products. When they found themselves in the midst of a pandemic, the FS team did not think twice: it would be through sophisticated technology that they would face that situation. That's how they started using Microsoft 365 solutions, ensuring flexibility and better performance for their employees.

title: OpenEdges Technology gains confidence in Microsoft 365 security and cost-effectiveness through Microsoft Solution Assessments
executive_summary: OpenEdges Technology is a semiconductor IP specialist company that develops and supplies modules required by various semiconductor companies based on semiconductor design technology. It easily supplies various design technologies, including memory controllers, interconnects, and NPUs, which embed the potential of artificial intelligence, to semiconductor products. OpenEdges Technology is contributing to the significant semiconductor growth in South Korea.

title: Dynamics 365 drives Cat® dealership into the 21st century
executive_summary: Foley, Inc. is the Cat dealer covering New Jersey, Staten Island, NY, the southeastern part of Pennsylvania, and northern Delaware, as well as Bermuda. From its founding as an automobile dealership in the early days, the company shifted to heavy equipment sales and rentals in 1957. Since then, it has grown to encompass six locations and a workforce of more than 800 employees.

title: Montgomery County Community College redefines and redesigns student data, journeys, and engagement with Microsoft Dynamics 365
executive_summary: N/A

title: FNSS empowers employee unity and innovation with Microsoft Viva Engage
executive_summary: FNSS, a leading defense company based in Türkiye, has transformed its internal communication with Microsoft Viva Engage. With a limited talent pool, FNSS prioritizes nurturing and retaining talent. With Microsoft Viva Engage, FNSS expanded access to corporate information and content, and helped build bridges between teams. With hundreds of departmental or interest-based working groups and communities, FNSS staff can easily exchange ideas, collaborate, and connect.

title: A dedicated coach for all BASF employees: Working more productively with Viva Personal Insights
executive_summary: There are a host of advantages to working in international teams. To ensure that employees can optimize the coordination of their largely digital collaboration across multiple continents, Microsoft developed Viva Personal Insights. BASF is among the many companies offering its employees this app as a virtual coach: Viva Personal Insights analyzes work behavior and suggests measures to enhance well-being, teamwork, and productivity. These data-driven reflections on how people work are proving very popular indeed.

title: Empowering prosthetic innovation: Össur's Azure Integration Services journey
executive_summary: Össur develops and manufactures prosthetics for customers all over the world. With Microsoft Biztalk Server approaching the end of support, and as the company begins to offer new and expanded services to its customers, a move from on-premises datacenters to a hybrid cloud model is required. Having now transitioned to Azure Integration Services, Össur has not only future-proofed its infrastructure, it has also better incorporated a diverse array of legacy apps and services into its new cloud infrastructure.

title: Mitsubishi Chemical Group approaches from top and bottom to innovate with Power Apps.
executive_summary: Operating globally, the company faces a complex cost structure due to different business systems for each affiliation. The company is focusing on reducing costs and optimizing operations.

title: LGT drives digital workplace transformation with Microsoft Copilot
executive_summary: The pandemic opened LGT’s eyes to the need for a modern, flexible work environment to facilitate seamless collaboration. The company committed to a comprehensive digitalization strategy that would deliver on these requirements.

title: Riachuelo implements corporate data lake on Azure and enhances its data governance
executive_summary: With support from the Microsoft Azure Cloud to store and intelligently manage data, as well as machine learning algorithms, the company has developed an environment called Self Service, which spans the entire company and has the flexibility to be used by each business area as it deems necessary to support its data-driven decision-making process.

executive_summary: N/A

title: LGT drives digital workplace transformation with Microsoft Copilot
executive_summary: The pandemic opened LGT’s eyes to the need for a modern, flexible work environment to facilitate seamless collaboration. The company committed to a comprehensive digitalization strategy that would deliver on these requirements.

title: Zenith & Company's active support capabilities that proactively identify customer needs help NCSOFT operate its global network efficiently
executive_summary: With a global network in North America, Europe, Japan, and Taiwan, starting in the US in 2000, NCSOFT has been working tirelessly based on the motto "a new world connected through joy.” NCSOFT expects to reduce costs and improve business efficiency simultaneously through license management with Zen-Portal based on Microsoft Teams.
products: Azure, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams

title: Openwork innovates wealth management, improves customer relationships with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: When consumers and families in the United Kingdom need qualified advice on how to build, keep, and manage wealth, they often turn to the Openwork network of financial advisers. The network manages £21 billion in assets, but like many financial institutions, the company struggled with multiple, disconnected customer service solutions and inefficient processes. With Microsoft Dynamics 365, Openwork built a cloud-based engagement platform to boost overall efficiency, drive revenue, reduce risk, and strengthen customer relationships with its advisers.

title: Walgreens Boots Alliance trims in-store audit times by 75 percent with Microsoft Power Platform
executive_summary: Walgreens Boots Alliance (WBA) strives to have a positive impact on the lives of its millions of daily customers. To ensure that products are on the shelves where they should be, the company has a robust asset protection program to guard against theft and loss. WBA made life easier for its program’s managers by giving them Microsoft Teams and the Asset Protection mobile app developed with Microsoft Power Apps.
products: Forms, Microsoft Teams, Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, SharePoint

title: Chipotle serves up fresh, personalized marketing with Dynamics 365 Customer Insights
executive_summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill lets its customers personalize food to their individual tastes, and the company wants to personalize its marketing efforts to target individual patrons’ interests and activities. The company traditionally had lots of data but no comprehensive customer data platform to make sense of it all. By deploying Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Insights, Chipotle can now organize, analyze, and enrich its customer information to target marketing efforts so they’re as meaningful and effective as possible.

title: Coca-Cola UNITED manages rapid growth with Microsoft Power Platform
executive_summary: Coca-Cola UNITED is one of the largest bottlers and distributors of Coca-Cola products in the United States. It has also been one of the fastest growing. While the company has been around for almost 120 years, most of its growth has occurred within the span of just four years. Microsoft Power Platform has turned out to be a key tool in helping Coca-Cola UNITED navigate this amazing growth. Here’s its story.

title: Schneider Electric powers up a sustainable energy future with Azure
executive_summary: Schneider Electric is a leading energy solutions provider that focuses on positively affecting the climate and economies around the world. The company wanted to simplify its application infrastructure and help customers like power providers and manufacturers optimize energy performance using the Schneider Electric EcoStruxure™ Power Advisor application. To achieve its goal, Schneider Electric migrated Power Advisor to Microsoft Azure and reconfigured it for multitenancy. The results? Simplified scaling, enhanced velocity, lower costs, and happier customers.

title: Campbell Soup Company transforms IT and boosts supply chain visibility with a single global SAP HANA environment on Azure
executive_summary: The Campbell Soup Company is an iconic food company that produces meals, beverages, and snacks and generates more than USD8 billion in annual revenue. To improve reliability and availability and build greater flexibility and scalability into its core SAP environments, especially after its large acquisition of Snyder’s-Lance—Campbell migrated to SAP HANA on Microsoft Azure. The company runs a single global instance of SAP, which has helped it greatly reduce downtime, make manufacturing more resilient, and gain deeper insights into its supply chain.

title: Edible Arrangements finds the personalized sweet spot for customer experience with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: Throughout 2020 and into 2021, gift delivery services have been a lifeline for people looking to celebrate special occasions remotely or just show someone they care. Edible Arrangements helps make moments like these possible, with a diverse selection of handcrafted products made from fresh, wholesome produce. The company adopted Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Insights, Azure Synapse Analytics, and Power BI to get a clearer view of its customer data. It now creates more personalized promotions, offering meaningful gifting experiences, encouraging more frequent purchases, and spreading more joy.
products: Azure, Azure Synapse Analytics, Dynamics 365 Customer Insights - Data, Power BI

title: VINCI Energies: The scalable benefits of running native applications in the cloud
executive_summary: For VINCI Energies in the Netherlands, data integration is essential to allow its national network to share knowledge and insights freely. But as the organization is growing, its current enterprise service bus (ESB) system began feeling the strain—pushing VINCI Energies in the Netherlands to find a more scalable solution that could grow with its datasets. That solution was Microsoft Azure Red Hat OpenShift, which combines the flexibility of a container platform with the scalability of cloud infrastructure. And after successfully adopting the solution at full scale, the network organization is now sharing its model throughout its global network to help other sectors in VINCI Energies with their own data challenges.
products: Azure Red Hat OpenShift, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint

title: Data offers insights into every drop
executive_summary: Anglian Water supplies more than six million customers across East Anglia and Hartlepool with water and water recycling services. As part of its “love every drop” commitment, the company works to efficiently manage and conserve water supplies as well as raise customer recognition of what a precious resource water is.

title: With high levels of security and trust, the NHS rapidly meets clinical demands using verified credentials
executive_summary: The National Health Service (NHS) in the UK is using verified credentials to support swift staff movement between NHS organizations, allowing staff to store their own verified records for employment, clearance, and other attributes on their smartphones.
products: Microsoft Entra ID, Microsoft Entra Verified ID

title: Keeping Local Without Sacrificing Innovation
executive_summary: If you happen to live in a Norwegian community, chances are high that your digital everyday banking experiences are powered by Eika, one of the largest financial service providers in the country. Eika differs from its competitors in its truly unique value proposition. Composed of 66 independent, competing local banks, Eika brings together the best of two worlds: the unmatched experience of a local bank committed to the community where customers live , and the ability to enable secure, modern, and comprehensive financial services based on a state-of-the-art banking platform and infrastructure.

title: Czech bank, Česká spořitelna, reshapes customer experience with Azure-based solution
executive_summary: Česká spořitelna is more than a bank—it educates people on how to better manage their finances in order to achieve personal prosperity. By enabling its customers to achieve more, the company empowers individuals to contribute to the growth of the Czech Republic as a whole. To bring its services to new levels, the company implemented Quadient Inspire Flex—a customer communications management solution from Microsoft partner Quadient—to improve customer communications. Based on Microsoft Azure cloud, Inspire is highly scalable, enables cost optimization, and enhances security, so that the bank can offer the best experience to its customers.
products: Azure, Microsoft Entra ID

title: Leatherman gets closer to its customers with Dynamics 365 Customer Insights
executive_summary: To better predict customer buying behaviors and deliver best-in-class experiences, US-based Leatherman has focused on fostering personalized customer journeys through multiple touchpoints and purchasing channels. The iconic tool maker is now using Dynamics 365 Customer Insights to get a 360-degree view of its customers and generate intuitive, seamless customer experiences, all while using automation and AI to get the most out of its data. The company is seeing rapid growth in online sales and brand loyalty, creating excitement for the future of direct customer engagement.

title: Valencia CF creates meaningful, hyper-personalized fan experiences with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: Valencia Club de Fútbol (CF), a 103-year-old football club in eastern Spain, has a dedicated and loyal fan base that spans generations. As an innovative and forward-thinking organization, the club is continuously improving the global fan experience and building new connections with the Valencia community. Using Microsoft Dynamics 365, the club gained new and actionable insights and a deeper understanding of its fans. From deploying an app to speed food orders in the stadium to checking-in with 1,500 season ticket holders who missed in-person games during the COVID-19 lockdowns, Valencia has used the insights from its customer data to create delightful, rewarding, and engaging fan experiences.

title: Flowe builds one of the first cloud-run digital banks
executive_summary: In 2017, one of the five major banks in Italy, Banca Mediolanum, had a vision to create a unique cloud-native open banking platform that went beyond finance. To make this leap, Banca Mediolanum founded Flowe in 2019—one of the world’s first banks running fully on Microsoft Azure. It has a focus on wellbeing, an aim to educate millennials about healthy financial behavior, and a purpose to empower people to live sustainably. In less than a year from the start of the project, Flowe’s open-banking platform and mobile apps went live. More than 650,000 users were onboarded in just six months, exceeding Flowe’s target by 400,000 users.

title: Porsche Cars North America delivers world-class service with Microsoft mixed reality and HoloLens 2
executive_summary: Porsche Cars North America (PCNA) is a brand built on dreams and the promise of product and service excellence. To help its dealer partners better maintain customers’ vehicles, PCNA is using Microsoft HoloLens 2 and Dynamics 365 Mixed Reality apps—Dynamics 365 Guides and Dynamics 365 Remote Assist—to revolutionize the service experience. With Guides, technicians can view a 3D hologram of a car and go through remote training classes without the cost and time required to travel to a distant training center multiple times a year. When technicians get stumped by a troublesome issue on the job, they can get guided 3D aid by using Teams on HoloLens to call an expert in another location. PCNA is excited about the ways these technologies will streamline vehicle service, enhance technicians’ work lives, and attract top new talent to the company.

title: Unilever migrates its SAP estate to Azure in 18 months, fueling unconstrained capacity for business growth
executive_summary: As one of the world’s largest consumer goods companies, Unilever and its brands are household names. To support its business needs and those of more than 3.4 billion daily consumers across 190 countries, Unilever set strategic transformational goals to modernize its infrastructure and drive growth across the company. Part of that ambitious strategy was a migration of its SAP and non-SAP environments, including its four core enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems, to Microsoft Azure. Unilever’s move to Azure has brought greater efficiency, scalability, and availability, including highly secure storage—all designed to position the company for a more sustainable and cloud-native future.
products: Azure, Azure Disk Storage, Azure Files, Azure Virtual Machines, SAP on Azure, Power BI

title: Nisbets cooks up the greatest customer experience on Microsoft 365
executive_summary: “What Microsoft 365 provides for the modern workplace can’t be matched,” says Peter Sephton, Executive Chairman at Nisbets. “As we expand into the Microsoft stack with Azure, we will build on our partnership and the success of Nisbets – in turn helping our many thousands of customers in hospitality worldwide.”

title: CQC partners with Microsoft to transform the way they regulate health & social care
executive_summary: The Care Quality Commission (CQC) is the independent regulator of health and social care in England. It was established in 2009 as an executive non-departmental public body of the Department of Health and Social Care of the United Kingdom. It has an ambitious strategy to transform the way it regulates.
products: Azure, Intelligent Data Platform, Dynamics 365, Dynamics 365 Customer Service, Microsoft Teams, Power Apps

title: Polish construction group Erbud optimizes processes across all its companies with Microsoft Dynamics 365
executive_summary: Erbud Group is the largest construction company in Poland, with subsidiaries in Germany, Belgium, France, and the Netherlands. Led by a profound commitment to its values—responsibility, innovation, security, and partnership—the organization decided that it needed to optimize its processes to successfully deliver better projects and services. To do that, Erbud Group made a bold move to adopt cloud solutions and simultaneously deployed Microsoft Dynamics 365 in all its six entities. Since this major effort, the company has gained 100 percent control over its building sites at all times and can manage projects faster at every stage of the construction process.

title: Enexis adopts Microsoft Mixed Reality technology and the industrial metaverse to take a leading role in the energy transition
executive_summary: Dutch state-owned utility provider Enexis is on a mission to drive the energy transition at a national level. This, however, requires significant changes. From infrastructure upgrades to grid expansions, Enexis is largely transforming its operations – and is doing it using new technology and greater amounts of skilled personnel. To make sure that its current and future workforce is equipped for the needs of the future, Enexis has rolled out a training program centered around using Mixed Reality with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Guides and HoloLens 2. An instant success across the company – allowing trainees to master materials 40% faster than in traditional ways – the initiative has persuaded Enexis to go even further, and venture into the possibilities offered by the industrial metaverse.

title: CARIAD creates a service platform for Volkswagen Group vehicles with Azure and AKS
executive_summary: With the automotive industry shifting to software defined vehicles, CARIAD, the Volkswagen Group software subsidiary, collaborated with Microsoft using Azure and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) to create the CARIAD Service Platform for providing automotive applications to brands like Audi, Porsche, Volkswagen, Seat and Skoda. This platform powers and accelerates the development and service of vehicle software by CARIAD’s developers, helping software become an advantage for the Volkswagen Group in the next generation of automotive mobility.

title: Kotsovolos transforms operations, brings sustainability, and boosts efficiency in just six months with Azure-powered solution
executive_summary: Kotsovolos-Dixons South East Europe is one of the leading electrical and electronics retailers in Greece. Managing about 100 stores and an inventory of thousands of products per store, it has embarked on a digital transformation journey aimed at revolutionizing its operations. The company asked Microsoft partner Yodiwo to devise a dynamic digital replica of each store, operating in real time. Using Plano360, Yodiwo’s all-in-one retail optimization platform powered by Azure, Kotsovolos managed to increase the efficiency of its premises and operations, as well as the adherence to planograms. It has also enhanced collaboration and paved the way for future AI applications.

title: Sulava stays at the forefront of collaboration technology with Microsoft Loop, improves efficiency and flexibility
executive_summary: Sulava, a Finnish IT consulting business based in Helsinki, needs to stay at the forefront of collaboration technology to offer great service to customers. The business introduced Microsoft Loop, a collaboration platform that comprises workspaces, components, and pages that stay in sync across Microsoft 365 applications when shared. Today, Sulava employees are working more flexibly, efficiently, and maintaining their position as thought-leaders in the world of collaboration technology.
products: Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365

title: CARIAD creates a service platform for Volkswagen Group vehicles with Azure and AKS
executive_summary: With the automotive industry shifting to software defined vehicles, CARIAD, the Volkswagen Group software subsidiary, collaborated with Microsoft using Azure and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) to create the CARIAD Service Platform for providing automotive applications to brands like Audi, Porsche, Volkswagen, Seat and Skoda. This platform powers and accelerates the development and service of vehicle software by CARIAD’s developers, helping software become an advantage for the Volkswagen Group in the next generation of automotive mobility.

title: Alltech fortifies business operations with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: Alltech is a global leader in the agriculture industry, helping farmers raise healthy plants and animals, feed the world, and protect the environment through nutrition and scientific innovation. Headquartered in Kentucky, the global company employs more than 5,000 people and produces specialty ingredients, premixes, supplements, feed, and other animal nutrition technologies to serve customers in more than 120 countries.

title: SOPHiA GENETICS leverages Microsoft 365 E5 and Microsoft Sentinel to minimize security risks and reduce costs
executive_summary: SOPHiA GENETICS pursued an IT security strategy based on the Best of Breed approach. This resulted in significant time, personnel, and cost expenditures, and posed a security risk because the then Managed Security Service Provider (MSSP) was not connected to Microsoft technologies such as Microsoft Azure.

title: Wipro invests USD $1 Billion in AI, trains 200,000 employees on GenAI principles with Microsoft Copilot
executive_summary: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has long been a focus area for Wipro, the global IT and consulting business, catalysed by a USD $1 Billion dollar investment in 2023. Today, 200,000 Wipro employees have been trained on the principles of GenAI and the organization remains committed to using the technology to help deliver value to customers faster and improve outcomes across the business.
products: GitHub, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Copilot for Security

title: Hillsborough County Public Schools standardizes on Microsoft Education technology to empower educators and enhance student learning
executive_summary: Hillsborough County Public Schools (HCPS), the eighth largest district in the United States by student population, required better technology investments in the classroom. The district implemented a long-term strategy of technology transformation and has since introduced many elements of Microsoft 365 Education into the classroom. With Microsoft Translator, Reading Progress, and Reflect in Microsoft Teams—the district now provides increased access to a more personalized education for over 220,000 children.

title: Kubota Environmental Engineering and a partner teamed to develop technology for optimized inspections of infrastructure with HoloLens 2
executive_summary: Since its establishment in 1890, Kubota Group has been involved in the development of modern waterworks through the use of iron water pipes, increasing food production and saving labor through agricultural machinery, harmonizing humankind and the environment through environmental facilities, and has been providing a wide range of products and solutions. The group's vision is to be a "platform that sustains life," and seeks to solve social issues in the sectors that are essential for the survival of humankind - food, water, and the environment - in order to realize a sustainable society.

title: CP AXTRA becomes first retailer in Thailand to amplify efficiency and optimize customer service with Copilot for Microsoft 365
executive_summary: N/A

title: Chester Zoo streamlines operations with Valto and Microsoft SharePoint
executive_summary: The renowned Chester Zoo in the United Kingdom spans 51 hectares and sees 2 million visitors per year. Facing challenges in document management and modernizing business applications, the zoo consulted with Microsoft partner Valto. Valto used SharePoint, Power Apps, and other Microsoft products to design and implement solutions for the zoo. These solutions streamlined document reviews, facilitated uniform orders, and provided news access, improving operational efficiency and upholding a seamless visitor experience.

title: INSPIRE Entertainment Resort: Establishes a Global Resort Integrated Service Environment with Microsoft Surface
executive_summary: INSPIRE Entertainment Resort, located on Yeongjong Island in Incheon, features 1,275 rooms and aspires to be the largest casino resort in Northeast Asia, driven by Hallyu culture. INSPIRE uses Microsoft Surface Pro 9 and Go 3 for digital check-ins, orders, and payments, creating a paperless, efficient, and secure environment. These devices support multiple languages, enhancing convenience for global guests, and seamlessly integrate with the resort’s management system, boosting operational efficiency and service quality.
products: SharePoint, Windows, Surface Pro, Surface Go

title: Rijksmuseum transforms how art-lovers engage with the museum, with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: The Rijksmuseum is one of the most well-attended museums in Amsterdam the Netherlands, welcoming millions of visitors annually from around the world. In response to changing customer and societal demands, including expectations for more personalized experiences, the Rijksmuseum chose Microsoft intelligent business applications (including Dynamics 365 Sales, Dynamics 365 Customer Insights, Dynamics 365 Finance, and Dynamics 365 Commerce) to accomplish its transformation goals. As a result, the museum has succeeded in creating more tailored customer experiences, streamlined communications.

executive_summary: Since its establishment in 1890, Kubota Group has been involved in the development of modern waterworks through the use of iron water pipes, increasing food production and saving labor through agricultural machinery, harmonizing humankind and the environment through environmental facilities, and has been providing a wide range of products and solutions. The group's vision is to be a "platform that sustains life," and seeks to solve social issues in the sectors that are essential for the survival of humankind - food, water, and the environment - in order to realize a sustainable society.

executive_summary: INSPIRE Entertainment Resort, located on Yeongjong Island in Incheon, features 1,275 rooms and aspires to be the largest casino resort in Northeast Asia, driven by Hallyu culture. INSPIRE uses Microsoft Surface Pro 9 and Go 3 for digital check-ins, orders, and payments, creating a paperless, efficient, and secure environment. These devices support multiple languages, enhancing convenience for global guests, and seamlessly integrate with the resort’s management system, boosting operational efficiency and service quality.

executive_summary: The Rijksmuseum is one of the most well-attended museums in Amsterdam the Netherlands, welcoming millions of visitors annually from around the world. In response to changing customer and societal demands, including expectations for more personalized experiences, the Rijksmuseum chose Microsoft intelligent business applications (including Dynamics 365 Sales, Dynamics 365 Customer Insights, Dynamics 365 Finance, and Dynamics 365 Commerce) to accomplish its transformation goals. As a result, the museum has succeeded in creating more tailored customer experiences, streamlined communications.

title: PKSHA leans on Copilot for Microsoft 365 as part of their team
executive_summary: PKSHA Technology develops algorithmic solutions and AI technologies that help companies become more efficient and improve their processes—they believe in the power of algorithms to solve some of the world’s biggest challenges. Through Copilot for Microsoft 365, the team optimizes their time on critical work by increasing efficiency in meeting preparations, data analytics, and ideation. With Copilot, PKSHA releases their products faster and more efficiently, creates better sales presentations and proposals, and improves their customer management.

title: Hong Kong Maxim’s Group serves streamlined sales and production with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: Maxim’s Group needed a scalable solution able to satisfy complex business needs that would simplify user experience and improve its customers’ ordering experience.

title: CISSS de l'Outaouais' DSMD enhances care collaboration and services with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: The Centre intégré de santé et de services sociaux (CISSS) de l'Outaouais wanted to overcome the constraints of geographic distance and resources to facilitate professional collaboration and simplify the coordination of care.

title: Coca-Cola Bottlers Japan Inc. migrates to Azure, transforms data analysis results
executive_summary: Coca Cola Bottlers Japan Inc. wanted to migrate its applications and SAP environment from on-premises datacenters to the cloud.
products: Azure

title: Uber Technologies migrates over 80 business processes encompassing 40,000 flows to Power Automate
executive_summary: When Uber Technologies moved its on-premises datacenters to a cloud service, the company took the opportunity to assess whether they should also move their automated processes to the cloud or consider another automation platform.

title: Argano unifies platforms with Dynamics 365 to keep pace with growth through streamlined, efficient operations
executive_summary: Argano needed to more efficiently integrate newly-acquired specialty consulting firms into its portfolio, with the goal of unifying business units on a common solution to streamline operations and enhance visibility.

title: Campari Group enhances collaboration and creativity with Microsoft 365 Copilot and Viva
executive_summary: Campari Group empowers its workplace with Microsoft 365 Copilot and Viva, driving collaboration, productivity, and innovation across its workforce.

title: Dow reimagines productivity and supply chain efficiency with Microsoft 365 Copilot
executive_summary: Dow faced challenges in cost management and operational efficiency within its supply chain. With millions at stake in logistics spending, the company sought a solution to improve billing accuracy, streamline processes, and reduce costly overcharges.

title: BESTSELLER ONLY dresses up omnichannel retail with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: BESTSELLER’s ONLY set out to power customer loyalty and drive new growth by adding the online, first party eCommerce experience to its Dynamics 365 Commerce solution to enable frictionless omnichannel customer journeys.

title: BP implements solid cloud governance and effective cost management with Azure
executive_summary: BP has moved a significant portion of its IT resources to the Microsoft Azure cloud platform over the past five years as part of a company-wide digital transformation. To manage and deliver all its Azure resources in the most efficient possible way, BP uses Azure Policy for governance to control access to Azure services. At the same time, the company uses Azure Cost Management to track usage of Azure services. BP has been able to reduce its cloud spend by 40 percent with the insights it has gained.
products: Azure, Cost Management, Azure Policy

title: Michael Hill optimizes inventory allocation and boosts sales with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce
executive_summary: Australia-based jeweler Michael Hill is known for high-quality, exceptional service and long-term customer loyalty. To sustain its reputation, the company used Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce to build a digital retail operations platform with end-to-end, multichannel capabilities and connected processes. By optimizing in-store operations, customer service, and other retail processes, Michael Hill has been able to successfully drive efficiencies, improve margins, and deliver stellar customer experiences.
products: Dynamics 365 Commerce, Dynamics 365 Finance, Power Apps

title: AT&T migration to Azure Databricks catalyzes technical staff, advances business goals
executive_summary: AT&T’s on-premises data architecture prevented decision-makers from connecting to a single source of truth and created data silos, costly compute workarounds, and barriers to innovation.
products: Power BI, Azure Databricks

title: WWF Italia makes preserving the planet easier with Dynamics 365 Business Central
executive_summary: WWF Italia supports conservation work not just in Italy, but in other nations where its parent organization, World Wildlife Fund, works to save endangered species and conserve wild lands. After years of struggling with disjointed on-premises systems to track and report on funding, the nonprofit opted for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central online. Now the nonprofit is making valuable staff time go farther, while also providing critically important reporting to donors, government agencies, and internal groups with Power BI. For WWF Italia, getting the greatest value out of its funds is about something much more than profit—it’s about preserving the most precious places and creatures on earth.

title: Sustainable digital transformation at Rolls-Royce
executive_summary: As the world transitions to a net zero carbon future, the industries in which iconic British brand Rolls-Royce operates are some of the most critical – but they are also some of the hardest to abate.
products: Azure, Azure Databricks, Azure Machine Learning, Power BI

title: RHI Magnesita: How a Synapse Analytics data platform is transforming the refractory industry
executive_summary: For more than 100 years, refractory products have played an essential role in the manufacturing of everyday materials such as glass and steel. As the world leader in refractories, RHI Magnesita wanted to expand their digital services to customers. An aspect of this involved offering not just a managed installation of their refractory products, but also continuously monitoring and identifying when these products need replacing – helping raise efficiency and avoid production having to shut down unnecessarily. Developing this kind of predictive analytics required RHI Magnesita to undertake a significant digital transformation and rebuild their entire IT infrastructure on Azure.

title: Microsoft Synapse technology, takes Multichoice analytics to the next level
executive_summary: As Africa’s leading entertainment company, MultiChoice delivers Direct To Home (DTH), Digital Terrestrial Television (DTT) and online video entertainment services through its entertainment platforms – DStv, GOtv, Showmax and DStv Now – to approximately 20 million subscribers across 50 countries in Africa. MultiChoice Group is the parent company of MultiChoice South Africa (including SuperSport, M-Net and DStv Media Sales), MultiChoice Africa Holdings, Showmax Africa and Irdeto.

title: Polish energy supplier dashes toward a green future with Microsoft Azure
executive_summary:
On track to making emission-free railways in Poland, PKP Energetyka blends the analytical capabilities of Power BI with Azure Machine Learning’s predictive forecasting models.
A solution developed in tandem with Microsoft partner Elitmind enabled real-time management of renewable sources to secure appropriate energy levels for powering rails. With this new system, the company stays on course to meet the goals of the Green Railway program, foreseeing the achievement of 85% of climate neutrality by the Polish rail sector by 2030.

title: Aga Khan University optimizes operations to improve services with Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: The Aga Khan University (AKU) is a private, not-for-profit institution of the Aga Khan Development Network (AKDN), whose mission is to improve quality of life in the developing world and beyond through world-class teaching, research, and health care delivery. Given the wide geographic scope of its operations and its enduring commitment to quality, the university has consistently prioritized technological advancement and innovation in order to better and more efficiently serve its constituents: the patients, students, faculty, and staff. AKU’s journey towards Microsoft Azure cloud is part of its digital transformation. The tools, functionality and agility provided by Azure cloud is helping AKU in areas of research, business intelligence, data analytics and security.
products: Azure, Azure Data Factory, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Teams, OneDrive for Business, Microsoft Entra ID, Power BI

title: Risikobasiertes Qualitätsmanagement: Cyntegrity erhöht mit Microsoft Azure die Datenintegrität von klinischen Studien
executive_summary: Clinical trials require the highest possible data quality. Only then can they deliver clinically meaningful results that lead to the development of effective drugs. Cyntegrity is one of the leading providers of technologies for risk-based quality management in the biopharma industry. The medium-sized enterprise helps pharmaceutical companies comply with this process, which is driven by the regulatory authorities for clinical trials. This involves identifying and evaluating critical data and processes as the basis for subsequent decisions on preventive and corrective measures—and it requires a lot and fast computing power. Cyntegrity wanted to meet the growing demand with scalable and secure technologies and reduce IT costs despite a higher number of configurations—which is why it relies on a suite of Azure services for its software-as-a-service solution.

title: Equinor takes leap forward on energy transition using Azure Machine Learning
executive_summary: Norwegian energy company Equinor ASA is on a mission to drive the global energy transition with the help of innovative technologies. To do this, the organization has launched an initiative to digitalize its gas trading activities and guide decision-making processes around them using data and insights. Culminated with the creation of a machine learning platform, the project is driving long-needed cultural and digital transformation across Equinor – bringing them one step closer to their sustainable pledges.
products: Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Data Factory, Azure Data Lake Storage, Azure Functions, Azure Service Bus, Azure Static Web Apps, Azure Synapse Analytics, Intelligent Data Platform, Azure Machine Learning

title: Milton Keynes University Hospital simplifies endpoint management, elevates mobile clinical care efficiency with Microsoft Intune
executive_summary: Milton Keynes University Hospital is committed to providing the highest quality of care and adopting technology to boost operational efficiency and enhance patient care capabilities for its community. The hospital deployed Microsoft Intune to simplify endpoint management, improve configuration and control over its Zero Trust environment, and enhance the mobile device experience for hospital staff. Combining Intune with Azure Active Directory and Defender for Endpoint provides a comprehensive platform of software as a service solutions to manage and safeguard its environment across multiple devices, platforms, and operating systems. The hospital’s Digital Services staff can now deploy and update apps using dynamic grouping, set security policies and audit compliance, and remotely wipe devices. The result is streamlined core security and IT operations that help ensure clinicians and nurses can access the most up-to-date versions of the vital applications they use daily for patient care.

title: Microsoft simplifies global employee expense management with Dynamics 365 Finance
executive_summary: When the complexities and costs of maintaining an on-premises infrastructure and a global web of both customized networks and third-party expense management systems became too much to handle, the Microsoft Finance Management team decided to centralize and standardize its core expense management operations. The team worked with the Microsoft Digital Employee Experience (MDEE) team, choosing Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and integrations with Microsoft Azure and Power Platform to help centralize and standardize Microsoft employee expense data and processes. The new system, called MyExpense, has streamlined and brought consistency to employee user experiences, helped reduce costs, and is ensuring Microsoft compliance standards with the Sarbanes-Oxley Act (SOX), while improving security and privacy, as well as accessibility and dependability of services
products: Azure, Azure Machine Learning, Dynamics 365 Finance

title: Nanoleaf boosts productivity by 33% with Dynamics 365 Business Central
executive_summary: As LED lighting pioneer Nanoleaf expanded to more than 200 global retailers, the company needed to consolidate multiple software programs into a single solution. Nanoleaf implemented Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central to optimize its financials and supply chain control, resulting in a 33% productivity improvement in its supply chain operations.
products: Dynamics 365, Dynamics 365 Business Central, Power Automate

title: Scope Technology heralds a new era of enterprise telematics with Microsoft Azure and OpenAI
executive_summary: In twenty years, Scope Technology has completely transformed how companies use telematics data. Building on a suite of Microsoft solutions like Azure and OpenAI Services, it enables fleets, insurance providers and automotive customers to encourage safer driving habits, promote eco-driving and improved vehicle usage efficiency. Through gamification, personalized communication, and AI-driven processes like automated detection of vehicle damage, the company is reshaping the growing mobility landscape globally, inclusive of fleet management, Usage-Based insurance and financial services.
products: Azure

title: Redi, set, go: Virgin Money delivers exceptional customer experiences with Microsoft Copilot Studio
executive_summary: With 6.6 million retail and business banking customers, Virgin Money is on a mission to make you “happier about money”. One way in which the brand innovates to deliver exceptional customer experiences is through its award-winning virtual assistant, built using end-to-end Microsoft technologies, including Copilot Studio, paired with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Service for managing the omnichannel customer experience.
products: Dynamics 365 Customer Service, Microsoft Copilot Studio, Power BI, Microsoft Teams, Dynamics 365

title: Network Rail embraces a more efficient and safer data-driven future with Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: Network Rail needed to modernize its data analytics solution for asset management and maintenance. The company’s Intelligent Infrastructure program chose Microsoft Azure to help build several new solutions, bringing together multiple data streams for asset management. One of the tools gives maintenance engineers better insight into the 20,000 miles of railway track and countless other assets that make up the network. Today, employees use the solution, called insight, to understand data 50% faster than before and improve efficiency, passenger experiences, and safety—all while saving costs.

title: AP Pension revolutionizes its data governance and analytics with Microsoft Fabric
executive_summary: AP Pension had decades’ worth of business and investment data and needed to establish a consolidated approach to analytical data that fits its principles and digital strategy. The company is redefining its insights with Microsoft Fabric to make actuarial teams, advanced users, and citizen developers benefit from the enhanced capabilities and flexibility of the platform. Co-creating and prototyping products in a secure, collaborative environment facilitates innovation, accelerating the development of solutions tailored to the firm's needs.
products: Microsoft Fabric

title: Ezra VeBitzaron redefines construction management with Dynamics 365 Business Central
executive_summary: Ezra VeBitzaron is a cornerstone of Tel Aviv-Jaffa's urban development since 1937. The company wanted to shift to the cloud to overcome integration and data flow issues faced with on-premises management systems, as well as facilitate smoother collaboration with its many contractors. After implementing Dynamics 365 Business Central, Ezra VeBitzaron saw more efficiency in its daily processes and an 11% cut in operational costs. Thanks to automation, it has also saved 75% of time spent on manual processes and made it more effective to collaborate with contractors and manage projects.
products: Dynamics 365 Business Central, Microsoft 365

title: DCS revolutionizes pharmaceutical logistics with Dynamics 365
executive_summary: Direct Customer Solutions (DCS), based in Bells, Tennessee, is one of the only independent, family-owned, third-party logistics (3PL) companies in the US pharmaceutical and related healthcare arena. DCS was founded in 2017 by healthcare industry veterans who saw an opportunity to offer pharmaceutical manufacturers a more effective distribution option. Taking a different approach from the traditional wholesale model, DCS doesn’t take the title of the products it distributes, and it eliminates common charge-back fees.
products: Dynamics 365 Finance, Dynamics 365 Sales, Power BI, Power Pages

title: Solv eliminates 98% of clerical errors with Dynamics 365 Business Central

executive_summary: Before 2018, BMW Group’s development fleet relied on manual data transfer and on-premises data processing, significantly slowing vehicle development and prototype cycles.
products: Azure App Service, Power BI, Azure OpenAI Service, Azure Data Explorer, Azure IoT Hub, Azure AI Services, Azure Databricks, Azure Kubernetes Service, Azure Database for PostgreSQL

title: Haptik leverages Microsoft Azure Machine translation models supporting more than 100 languages; increases local queries by 2.5X and reduces human interventions by 80%
executive_summary: Jio Haptik Technologies Limited (Haptik) is an AI company that empowers conversational commerce experiences. A subsidiary of Reliance Jio Platforms (Jio), Haptik helps brands acquire, convert, engage and delight users with AI-driven, personalized, conversational experiences across 20 channels and 130 languages. With the vision of creating the most compelling conversational commerce platform of the 21st century, Haptik’s Conversational Commerce platform enables brands to design delightful experiences that improve conversion rates across every stage of their customer’s journey. Haptik’s leading clients and partners include KFC, Whirlpool, Starhub, HP, Reliance Jio, CEAT, Disney Hotstar, OLA, and Zurich Insurance among others. The company has been featured as a Category Leader across many platforms including Gartner, G2, Opus Research & more.
products: Azure AI Translator

title: ELFT powers quality improvements using Power BI and Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: “There are so many different boundaries and silos in healthcare, but most people get care from multiple parts of the system. So what we’re trying to create is a system that enables people to wrap themselves around what really matters to our patients and our staff and to be able to make things better through a scientific approach to making change,” explains Amar Shah, Chief Quality Officer at East London NHS Foundation Trust.

title: Denso’s development of “human-like” robots using Azure OpenAI Service as the brain to help robots and humans work together through dialogue
executive_summary: N/A
products: Azure

title: Using Azure AI and Power Apps, Tokyo Metro Develops a Track Abnormality Detection Solution by Amateur and Pro Developers and Business Experts
executive_summary:
<Summary supported by generative AI>
Background: Tokyo Metro Co., Ltd. operates nine subway lines in Tokyo and needs to maintain them regularly.
Problem: The company used to rely on human visual inspections, which were laborious and time-consuming.
Solution: The company developed a solution that uses Microsoft Azure AI services and Microsoft Power Platform to detect equipment deterioration and abnormalities from images of railroad tracks.
Objective: The company aims to improve the quality of inspections while reducing the workload on employees by building their own app.

title: Washington State Department of Natural Resources uses Azure AI to automate aquatic resource monitoring, saving months of experts’ time
executive_summary: The Washington State Department of Natural Resources (DNR) uses Microsoft tools to achieve its mission of sustaining and protecting the state’s lands and waters for current and future generations. Making good decisions about how to manage millions of acres requires massive amounts of data, which requires lots of time to analyze. In its quest to monitor eelgrass each summer, the Nearshore Habitat Program gathers 350 hours of underwater video footage, all of which must be stored and classified. To process the video data more efficiently, ecologists in the Aquatic Resources Division used Microsoft Azure for cloud storage solutions and automating video classification with the help of AI. These technological innovations boost scientists’ productivity while advancing climate change research.
customer: Washington State Department of Natural Resources
products: Azure, Azure AI Services, Azure Cloud Services, Azure Data Lake Storage, Power BI, Azure Machine Learning

title: Developing AI models in weeks rather than months: Siemens IT relies on the Azure cloud platform for its artificial intelligence projects
executive_summary: Accurate forecasts of operating figures are a boon to any industrial enterprise, enabling them to make precise production estimates and avoid extra costs. Siemens has long used artificial intelligence (AI) to create forecasts and provide targeted support to its departments. In the past, however, the development process ate up a lot of time. To boost the efficiency and quality of these kinds of AI models, Siemens IT developed a platform based on Microsoft Azure that functions as a customizable template for the entire company. Developing and deploying AI models used to take months. With the platform [ai:attack], it can now be done in just a couple of weeks.
products: Azure, Azure AI Services, Azure AI Vision, Azure Machine Learning studio, Azure Machine Learning

title: Locobuzz delivers the future of Customer Experience with Microsoft Azure OpenAI
executive_summary:
Locobuzz is a unified Customer Experience (CX) platform that transforms customer engagement for brands in India, South-East Asia, the United States and the United Kingdom. Headquartered in Mumbai, it delivers rich insights into customer behavior, competitor insights and performance analytics across digital channels.
It also leverages engagement opportunities and streamlines processes, which in turn drives effective business decisions, product innovation and digital growth. Locobuzz’s CX platform is used by organizations across sectors such as hospitality, telecom, automotive, BFSI, aviation and more.

title: Mercy lays the foundation for a future of innovation in patient care using Microsoft Azure to unlock insights from data in the cloud
executive_summary: Mercy, one of the largest healthcare systems in the United States, aided its digital transformation by using Microsoft Azure to decrease operational costs, improve the patient experience, and give its providers better access to data. The company wanted to modernize its infrastructure and extract more value from its sizeable data archives to keep up with evolving patient and doctor expectations. With support from Microsoft, Mercy identified business outcomes and undertook a digital transformation to achieve them. On Azure, the company improved efficiency, connected previously siloed data, reduced patient stay durations, and built a foundation for ongoing innovation.
products: Azure, Azure AI Document Intelligence, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Machine Learning

title: Ernst & Young processes emergency loans for small business using Microsoft Power Platform
executive_summary: When the COVID-19 pandemic hit the United States, the government passed the Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security (CARES) Act, which included financial support for small businesses. This support was provided under the Paycheck Protection Program (PPP), and it included loans as well as forgiveness on qualified expenses. The scope was huge: More than 5,000 US banks have processed over $500 billion in PPP loans since the program began and over 5 million borrowers have benefited from it.
products: Azure AI Services, Microsoft Entra ID, Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, Power Pages, SharePoint

title: QuoteWizard boosts engineers’ efficiency, employee satisfaction, competitive edge with Microsoft Power Platform
executive_summary: QuoteWizard connects online customers with highly competitive insurance quotes. But the company’s IT leaders realized that its human-powered development ticketing system wasn’t scalable or flexible enough to keep up with company growth—and that engineering teams couldn’t prioritize the innovative work they really wanted to do. QuoteWizard used Microsoft Power Platform to build an automated, AI-powered ticket routing system to match tickets with the right talent at the right time to help the company improve efficiency, hone its competitive edge, and deliver a better employee experience.

title: SimpliContract leverages Microsoft Azure to deploy its CLM platform
executive_summary: SimpliContract is a SaaS-based and AI-powered, end-to-end enterprise contract lifecycle management (CLM) platform. It democratizes contract authoring and establishes effective AI-driven post-signature contract management practices. The organization’s solutions help enterprises accelerate revenue, reduce risk and expenses, improve compliance and boost productivity. In addition, the platform supports users across the entire contract lifecycle and enables internal and external stakeholders' collaboration.
products: Azure, Azure Blob Storage, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, Azure Machine Learning

title: Bond Brand Loyalty améliore les performances en toute sécurité, accélère l’intégration des clients de 20 % en utilisant Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: Bond Brand Loyalty (Bond), a customer experience, loyalty, and growth firm, used Microsoft Azure to scale to more than 2 petabytes of transactions while maintaining security and privacy. The company, which operates programs with more than 100 million members, manages rewards programs by keeping track of points, rewards, and customer communications. To deliver seamless customer journeys, Bond processes billions of rows of data every day. The company recognized the need to strategically shift to the cloud and enhance its technology with Azure. Bond built a modern offering with Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Data Factory, and Azure Synapse Analytics. Now the company is scaling its business globally to serve thousands more customers.

title: PointClickCare migrates siloed healthcare data to Azure to be AI-ready
executive_summary: Provider disconnects over patient treatment are all too common, and the healthcare industry is experiencing historically low staffing and a wave of new industry clinicians, which puts patients at risk.

title: Ma’aden empowers employees with Microsoft 365 Copilot and Azure OpenAI, saving 2,200 hours monthly
executive_summary: Ma’aden, a mining company in Saudi Arabia, aims to grow tenfold by 2040. To do this, it needed to focus on empowering its current workforce for higher productivity and efficiency.

title: Kinectify fights financial crime in the gaming world with Microsoft Azure
executive_summary: The modern gaming industry must protect itself against illegitimate activity. Kinectify, an anti-money laundering (AML) risk management technology company, uses its modern AI-powered platform to collect and analyze millions of daily transactions to detect suspicious activity. Kinectify has been able to build its scalable, robust, Microsoft Azure–powered AML platform with a seamless combination of Azure Cosmos DB, Azure AI Services, Azure Kubernetes Service, and the broader capabilities of Azure cloud services.

executive_summary: School districts across the US struggle each day to communicate with students’ family members who speak a variety of languages. Translation services are slow, expensive, and prone to errors. The Lexmark Translation Assistant can translate scanned files from one language to or from more than 100 languages in minutes, producing printed copies that retain all design and formatting. Lexmark’s scanner, printer, and translator uses Azure AI Translator for the actual translation, ensuring highly accurate output while saving significant time and money.

executive_summary: ClearTax helps gig workers and first-time filers in India access their income tax refunds and connect to the financial ecosystem. Its viral generative AI-based platform needed a robust cloud provider to support increasing traffic.

title: Transforming law enforcement: Louisiana State Police’s digital revolution with Power Platform
executive_summary: The Louisiana State Police (LSP) needed to create a digital solution for statewide tracking of sexual assault kits to meet a legislative mandate while providing survivors with more privacy, transparency, and accountability.
